title: Quick Art - 1-Tap Photo Editor
description:
Marvelous real-time cutout camera and one-tap photo editing beyond imagination, with trendy creative photo effects. The distance between you and the pro is only Quick Art Camera and Template! The secret weapon to make your photos stand out!

=== AI Magic, Show Your Style ===

【Cartoon portraits】
Automatically turn your portrait photos into various artistic styles, such as Disney cartoon, sketches, canvases, printings, etc. 

【Real-time Cutout Camera】
Without a green screen, cutout camera can also distinguish between the person and the background in real time, allowing you to traverse into different stereoscopic scenes and designs immediately. It's so much fun! There is also a new effect: add a stunning three-dimensional light effect between you and the original background to make you more beautiful in the lens.

【Trendy templates, create same style】
Rescue novice! Excellent one-tap photo editing template, everyone can make masterpiece in seconds! Each template automatically integrates cutout, stereo background, stereo light effect, layered filters, artistic effects and high-class filters. With just one click, you can easily create your style photos and lead the fashion of social networks!

【Double exposure, create masterpiece of photography】
One-click double exposure, bid farewell to tedious operations, easy to get art blockbusters! Superimpose portraits and various pictures to create a shocking and mysterious visual effect, and immediately form a stunning and dreamy new work!

【Smart cutout, change stereo background】
AI automatic cutout, Quick Art exclusively designed stereo backgrounds such as hollowed-out posters, Van Gogh Polaroid, letter space, doutone, and also carefully selected numerous wallpaper-level backgrounds, such as tropical plants, floral illustrations, minimalist symmetry, and so on. Just one tap, make your style!

【Stereo light effect, heighten atmosphere】
The beautiful stereo light effect immediately enhances the atmosphere of the photo, making you surrounded by fireworks, rainbows or nordic aurora, making the photo render retro glitches or light leaks, making the photo dotted with lens flare or bling sparkle. Such fantastic effects, come and try it!

【Separate people and bg, partial editing】
Quick Art's exclusive feature, separates people from the background, adds different filters and effects to people and the background, that making the inspiration burst instantly! Easily realize all kinds of wild ideas and feel creative!

【Professional Adjust Tools】
Rich advanced color adjust tools, edit like a pro, including brightness, contrast, saturation, color temperature, etc. Helps you control every detail of the details with ease!

title: Polarr
description:
Polarr is the easiest app to create your own aesthetics and share with others. 

• Easily customize your own style with selective colors, overlays.
• Generate QR and short codes to share styles with others. 
• Segment your photo with A.I. to easily make complex edits.
• Upload your own overlays to push the boundaries of your styles.

Included effects:
• Selective objects: Sky, Person, Background, Vegetation, Building, Ground, Animal, etc
• Selective masks: Brush, Radial, Gradient, Color, Luminance.
• Overlays: Gradient, Duotone, Weather, Texture, Backdrops, Custom Overlay, etc.
• Retouch: Skin, Liquify, Face shapes (mouth, teeth, nose, chin, etc).
• Global adjustments: Light, Color, HSL, Toning, Effects, Fringing, Details, Curves, Vignette, Grain, LUT

Styles:
• Import style as QR or short code.
• Create style with all included effects.
• 100 free style backups with Polarr account.
• 120 preset styles for film emulations.
• Batch import styles.

Productivity:
• Batch photo exports.
• Face detection.
• A.I. object segmentation.
• Polarr account backups and sync filters across all devices.

Simple and practical retouching app

Simplify complexity, neat typography

Featured series of colors, pure and gradient
Easily click to add color to your photos

comments: It's a pretty basic filter app, which works fine in it's free version. When first installing and running the app, you need to be careful to hit the X in the top left of the screen, because it immediately tries to sub you to the pro version. Once exiting from that screen, it can take up to 10 mins for the app to load all the effects and filters. This can give you the impression that the app is broken. All D3D effects were broken (Angel Wings you see in ads), constant errors.

It works poorly on Android. Constant crashing, lagging, taking long time to load, crashing while trying to save a picture. Now it doesn't show images when picking images from the gallery, it's all white and gray squares. Filter images don't load either. The worst thing is that no one cares. Very upsetting. I've had a very bad experience with this app, although the filters are great. Fix the android app. Android users deserve good things too.

I would love this app if it didn't have problems/error. I could say this is one of the worst apps i've been using. The video is always glitching. My phone's network connection is stable but the loading is very slow (filters and effects). It takes minutes to save the video and photos I edited. Please fix the problem

Just months ago I barely experienced any problems with this app even as a beta tester. Now suddenly the filters, effects, and even my gallery never load up. It's to the point where you simply cannot make use of the app. This problem has been more prevalent & unbearable than ever in recent months so it seems as though the developers don't intend on fixing it anytime soon. Wasted potential.

This app is so frustrating. The video is always glitching and bugging. You really need to fix your android version quick. I really want it to stop now. This app has some of the best filters. I need it fixed as soon as possible. I understand it will take long.The first start is cause you have the best filters. The other star is for another thing that I will not talk about. Anyway make this app better for android users. Not just iphone users should have apps for themselves! Thxx for your time!

title: Night Mode Camera
description:
Night Mode Camera  is the professional camera app through which users can easily adjust 4 to 10 x zoom.

 Night Mode Camera  app allows you to see faraway objects in low light. You've got four different color options to find the object with contrast photo shooting and video recording for night philter effects. Even in dark places, you can also use this application as a microscope, binoculars, magnifier, ultra zoom, night camera, and much more with autofocus Flash Light. With the assistance of this application, you can manually adjust the camera, such as exposure, And dark areas can help.

Totally free application which provides you the best quality resolution for capturing images at low light, You have a portable version in your hand & no need to carry a big Night mode Telescope or binoculars with you, having extra zoom which makes more accurate visibility of so far objects. Make the faraway object really visible. You can keep eye on someone so far from you.

The application runs very smoothly and the switching between the front and back camera works without any delays and lags. During the photo taking and video recording, you can choose from different effects and change camera sensitivity to achieve the best camera shot.

FEATURES::

• Green, Red, Blue, Yellow color effects 
• Photo Camera
• Video Recording
• High-quality images
• Gallery and image previewer
• Front camera and Rear Camera
• Sharing the Images and Videos
• Easy to use
• Simple UI

comments: Crystal clear easy to use

Fine camera app with nice but pretty common features. It's a bit strange that you can't set focus by tapping the screen (at least I've got used to this feature while trying many other camera apps) and zoom can't be set by pinching the screen either. 🤷 Otherwise, you can get used to these after all, and the quality of the photos made with the app has nothing to complain about either. ☺️👍 Hope that delay between shooting and making the photo can be shorten in the not so far future, too. 🤞

I'm sorry for the current rating but im totally getting frustrated. Everytime I open this app, yes it is working, but for some reason it shuts down the entire audio of my phone. As in of the phone, not just the recording. youtube, my own files. everything. no sound. audio came back after i reboot the phone. but again when i open your app, same thing. what is going on? i can't do this forever with my phone each time i use your app. this last time, i reboot my phone again and it crashed.

Excellent variety of choices in image size. That's what I was looking for! My default camera limits choices to huge file sizes - this app is so much better and easy to navigate if you just want a simple camera that lets you choose your preferred balance of quality and space saving.

title: Collage Maker - Photo Editor & Photo Collage
description:
Just select several pictures, Photo Collage Maker & Editor instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Unleash your creativity in our photo lab! It’s completely free!

Features:
● Combine up to 18 photos to create pic collage.
● 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from!
● Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
● Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
● Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
● Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
● Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
● Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps.


📷 Grid
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

📷 Edit
All-in-one photo editor provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

📷 Freestyle
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

📷 Story Template
100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper… Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends.

📷 Multi-fit
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 3:2 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Collage Maker is the best photo collage maker, pic stitch and photo editor for Instagram and printing. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com

comments: I love this app,, its super easy to use and I always get the result I want! I like its simplicity. If there's a paywall I havn't found it yet. Even if there were features to buy, I have all I need already. The only downside i guess would be all the ads, but they have to make money somehow!! All in all 10/10, would DEFINITELY recommend.

So I decided to down load this to make my own wallpapers, I was kinda disappointed where you had to buy a lot of the things. There is like a subscription. (Not a one time payment.) I am easily able to make my own wallpapers though which is nice. There are no pop up ads. But even though there is a subscription for a lot of stuff, there are still ads that you have to watch for other things. Like, what? They are trying to rack in the money. I wouldn't recommend doing the subscription. Not worth it.

I'm sorry, I don't see how this app has 4.9 stars. I couldn't use it because at the slightest touch of a photo, it would go crooked. I spent 20 minutes trying keep the 4 photos in my collage straight because anytime I tried adjusting their size, they would also go crooked. PLEASE add an option to choose to keep photos straight. Also, not to sound callous but most of the templates are so poorly designed, it's as if there was no planning or thought process put into them but just thrown together

I love this app, even if my phone is full this app stil works and download images. And that it allows you to still use a font and so on even if you didn't buy the newest version of the app. If you're reading this, im talking to you download it you won't regret it believe me, if i get a new phone this is the first app i download every time...... Kind regards, Adelie.

Just got it by accident (I thought it was one I'd previously used), and have only used it for one collage but so far I LOVE IT! I have a lot of photo (and video) editing apps/software and was just looking to combine 2pics for Instagram bc they don't make creativity outside of their 1:1 box😉 very easy; it not only does that but (from the looks of it) a whole lot more, and in a really easy way! I don't often do "I just got this" reviews - only when I'm very pleasantly surprised. Which I am!

title: Keepsake Frames
description:
Keepsake makes it easy and affordable to frame your best photos. Browse dozens of frames, instantly previewing your photo in each one. All items are handmade locally and include free shipping! Keepsake provides a great option for a personal gift, or an easy way to do some home decorating.

IMPRESSIVELY HIGH QUALITY
*Every Keepsake frame is individually handmade
*Prints are made using high-end industrial printers, to ensure premium quality at all print sizes

REFRESHINGLY FAIR PRICES

summary: Your Photos. Printed. Framed. Delivered
recentChanges: Design and performance improvements to make Keepsake even faster and easier!
comments: Frustrating. Ive ordered several. When the frames fit the photo, the result can be nice. More often than not the frame choices don't fit the photo. Need a custom option. I usually abandon my session.
App is so easy to use..from the ordering process to billing and shipping. Then I got my pictures, very carefully pkged, and they came out perfectly, just the way I ordered them.

App is simple to use. They offer really nice frames that will work with any home decor. They are fast too!! I ordered on Wednesday and had it hanging on my wall Friday! It wrapped well, neatly, & beautifully. I was so in love with the box. I will be making more purchases in the future. They offer canvas prints too!!
Professional and beautiful service! The app was an ease to use and the 4 picture gallery wall of our favorite travel photos is complete. Will order again! Highly Recommended!

Because it's an expensive process to have something professionally framed, I was curious about Keepsake Frames and decided to give them a try. I am SO happy that I did. My photo was beautifully and professionally framed, securely packaged and arrived very quickly. I will definitely be using them again, especially since they are located here in the US. It is a pleasure to support a small business! Sandi Scranton Randolph NJ

title: IllisiumArt
description:
Unleash your creativity with llisium – a easy photo editor.
No account creation required, just download and start editing.
Capture any moment and edit with over 2 million combinations of effects, overlays, and filters.
Share of your photos seamlessly with friends or followers through email, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, or any social network.

Features:
 
• Create photo collages easily with a variety of preset collages, grid style, customized ratio, and background.
• Instantly adjust the color of your photo in one easy click using Auto Fix.
• Use Double Exposure to create an array of effects easily with layers and adjustable transparency.
• Create cool photo effects using Stylize (pencil sketch, poster, watercolor and more).
• Effortlessly remove blemishes, red-eye, smoothen skin, or whiten teeth with simple tools.
• Bring out the color with Color Splash effect or add impact with Focal Blur.
• Choose from a range of effect packs to give your image the look and feel you want.
• Adjust the tone of the photo with overlays – amplify the tone, cool it down, or add surreal shades.
• Easily add text to your photos with a variety of fonts to choose from.
• Finish off your editing process with the right border - pick a style that suits you.
• Keep things fresh with our growing release of additional effects, overlays, and border packs.
• Keep track of your favorite effects and overlays with the Favorites button.
• Crop and resize images quickly and easily before saving.

title: Color Grab (color detection)
description:
Color Grab is the ultimate on-the-go color tool. Pick, capture and recognize colors simply by pointing the camera.
Leading and worldwide used by designers, artists, professionals, developers, scientists and color-blinds.

#1 MUST HAVE APP FOR DESIGNERS & ARTISTS. FREE!


KEY FEATURES:
●  Real-time color measurement (color metering)
●  Color Palette Generator. 
●  Extract colors and maps from your photos.
●  Color recognition (color-2-name).
●  Real-time calibration mode - use reference white object.
●  Custom white balance.
●  Color palettes and harmonies themes generation tool.
●  Colors blending tool - mix colors.
●  Tune tool - refine your colors.
●  Find the perfect color combinations.
●  Discover and reveal matching colors.
●  Color locking indication.
●  "Instant Picking" - tap-2-capture.
●  Viewfinder smart processing.
●  Supports most-common color models (RGB, HEX, HSV, LAB, see below).
●  After-shot color analysis.
●  Export to popular applications such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Excel, CSV, PaintShop, Gimp, Inkscape, AutoCAD, Datasheets, etc.
●  Color conversions.
●  Accessibility; hear the color by pressing the volume buttons.
●  Copy color to clipboard. 
●  Share and post color cards as image or text.
●  Paint your wallpaper background with a solid color.

ADDITIONAL CONTROLS:
●  Turn flash light in low-light conditions.
●  Smart color stabilizer.
●  Smart color locking mechanism.
●  Motion-sensed auto-focus.
●  Zoom control.
●  White-balance control.
●  Camera switching (use rear or front).

SUPPORTED COLOR PALETTES:
●  Analogous, Monochromatic, Triad, Triad Pro, Complementary, Compound, Pentagram, Tetrad, Tetrad Pro, Shades, Hues, Inca, Gaudi, Butterfly, Europa. 

SUPPORTED COLOR REFERENCES:
●  RAL Classic

●  YPbPr SD & HD

comments: VERY disappointed in this new version! ZERO instructions anywhere. WHERE are the recorded colors (if it records them). All the wonderful features in the Play description are accessed HOW?! Not via any menu I can find. All I can access is the "Capture" screen as shown on the left in the description images.; the other screens are nowhere to be found, via anywhere or any icon I click ?? That's all that shows. ?***ALSO****, like many other Apps in the Play Store, HOW MUCH DOES THE UPGRADE COST???? PLEASE be transparent and SAY what it costs before pressing the Purchase button! One dollar? Ten dollars? 29 dollars??? What!? Pretty angry - with NO instructions and NO cost transparency. I'll chage to 5 stars if I am missing something obvious.

This is an impressive app! It gives an extremely detailed analysis of the accurate color(s) of whatever item you are scanning for color matching. This is going to make painting, decorating and color coordination easier and more precise than ever. I am actually excited to go get paint that's going to match even the oddest and rarest colors I can come up with.

Nice app. The info/instruction pop-ups make it easy to get started. Useful option to pair the color hex for a specific brand of paint (ie. valspar). Color hex saved under paint can icon (chk instructions). Ads not intrusive, option to purchase app came up once; will decide after I try out more options.

I downloaded this app in hopes to solve a disagreement between my boyfriend and I over the true color of a paint swatch, thats how I discovered this awesome little tool. It never before occurred to me just how useful such an app could be. The applications in which I can see myself applying this handy little tool are pretty endless. Overall it's a great app if you're serious about color identification and ease of use. Its guaranteed to please. I'm definitely going to have fun on this Color Grab.

I tried several other apps without success. It wasn't easy at the beginning but I finally was able to mimetize a color to print a decal with the same color as background. That was possible but using the color pick and the color encoding that I was able to use with Gimp2 on white vinyl stick material. However a bit of some information would be nice to make easier to navigate between the icons. It took me done time to be able to get to the picture I took for the pick color.

PicSky photo editor app comes with many one tap photo editing tools to take your photo art experience to the next level. Enjoy the incredible app and show your creativity with neon effects, drip effects and marvellous background changer!

⭐ Cutout Templates:
With Cutout Templates you can make complicated art with only one tap. With template what you need to do is just choose a picture and you will get an outstanding edited photo.

⭐ Neon Spiral:
Your photo experience will be unforgettable with the neon spiral. PicSky offers a comprehensive collection of spiral effects in different styles. In addition to neon effects there are Spiral, Rainbow, Wings, Love and much more.

⭐ Dripping Effect:
Drip effect brings some motion to your photo, Unleash your inner drip artist with the awesome dripping effect and style. You can arrange the drip style and background color instantly. Combine drip effect with other photo editing tools like neon spiral for an epic photo!

It is so much fun to edit background if you have this app. With one magical click remove background and change it with an amazing background image.

There is a huge collection High-quality filters effect  for photo and also you can apply to anyone that is suitable for your photo.

Just select several pictures, instantly it will remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick 100+ layout, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. It’s completely free.

title: VSCO: Photo & Video Editor with Effects & Filters
description:
VSCO is a place where expression matters most.  We offer creative photo and video editing tools, inspiration, and a place for you to be you. Use our advanced filters, effects, and presets to increase your creativity, improve your pictures and reach your full potential. 

FREE PHOTO EDITOR
"• Take your photography to the next level with 10 free VSCO presets.
• Use editing tools like Contrast and Saturation to make your photos pop or use Grain and Fade to add texture and mimic analog film effects.
• Adjust or play around with your photo perspectives with Crop and Skew. 
• Save and recreate your favorite edits with Recipes.
• Easily apply filters to your pictures."

ADVANCED PHOTO EDITING TOOLS
"• Join VSCO Membership to access VSCO’s complete preset library with over 200+ presets.
• Recreate vintage film looks by Kodak, Fuji, Agfa, and others with Film X.
• Use advanced photo editing tools like HSL and Split Tone.
• Frame your images with a touch of color using Borders.
• Enhance your pictures with impressive effects."

VIDEO EDITOR
"• Transform your videos on mobile with the same premium VSCO presets and advanced editing tools from our photo editor.
• Adjust white balance and experiment with color control with HSL.
• Use smooth slo-mo effect to keep up with the latest trends online."

VSCO MONTAGE
"• Tell a video story and make a moving collage by layering videos, images, and shapes.
• Celebrate moments, illustrate a mood, or experiment with photos and videos you already have in your Studio.
• Adjust the opacity of any media layered in to create an eclectic range of customized gel colors and double exposures."

CONNECT WITH A CREATIVE COMMUNITY
"• Explore inspiring photos, videos, and editorial in Discover.
• Find people you know and connect with friends already on VSCO.
• Try something new with weekly photo Challenges exclusive to your VSCO membership."

SHARE WITH #VSCO
• Share your photos and videos with #VSCO for a chance to be curated by VSCO. We can’t wait to see what you create.

MEMBERSHIP TRIAL AND SUBSCRIPTION TERMS
Start your VSCO membership with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee. Your VSCO membership will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the trial period.

If you'd like help with any issues, please visit vs.co/help to submit a ticket.

Read more about our terms and conditions here —
https://vsco.co/about/terms_of_use

Read more about our privacy policy here —
https://vsco.co/about/privacy_policy

comments: this app is good. had to come here to tell that VSVO for Samsung is not working for my samsung phone when it comes to editing my caption after i posted pic. i like to use vsco for samsung because it doesnt make my pic crack when i import the pic however, the error i encountered either i want to delete or edit my post, is annoying. had to do that using the original vsco, not the vsco for samsung. hope you can fix it.

I really like this app. There are great filters for my photos and a simple interface. However lately when I try to save photos, they're not straightened and instead tilted which is frustrating. There are other small bugs as well. After sending an email the team said they're aware of the problem but little else to help and no updates. I pay a subscription and use vsco often. I love the app but it would be great if these bugs could be fixed in a timely manner. I'd rather not move to another app.

The best app to add emotion and extra layer of feelings to any photo. My personal favorite photos editing app of all times. Have being usieng it ever since the earlier days of Lightroom filters. But there are still issues compares to the iOS version, I use both iOS and Android, the experience on Android is behind, I hope the developers haven't gave up on Android yet, please don't give up. As a long time pay user, I wish this app keep on going and get better with each update. Thank you VSCO.

I learned the hard way that VSCO doesn't save your studio edits after uninstalling the app. I didn't expect that my digital break would lead to that, I wouldn't have uninstalled it otherwise. I switched my phone & gallery saved VSCOs did not back up to Google Photos, meaning if I wanna continue usage, I start from the scratch I began 2 weeks ago. It makes sense to me now that unloaded drafts are discarded once the app is uninstalled, but the inconveniences could've been avoided if I was warned.

This app used to be really good, I haven't been able to import an image for about 2 months now. Whenever I've spoken to customer service; they've advised they're aware of the issues and told me to try alternative importing methods despite how I said no method works...there's weekly updates or whatever but none of them fix this. Teach your customer service to think instead of using scripted replies 100% of the time, they're frustrating and negate fixing any issues.

title: Ashura Muharam Photo Frames & Muharam Sms 2019
description:
:Muḥarram (Arabic: محرّم) is the first month of the Islamic calendar. The general meaning of the adjective muharram means "banned, barred, forbidden, illegal, illicit, impermissible, prohibited, unlawful, unpermitted, unauthorized or even taboo".

It is one of the four sacred months of the year during which warfare is forbidden.[1] It is held to be the second holiest month, after Ramaḍān. Since the Islamic calendar is a lunar calendar, Muharram moves from year to year when compared with the Gregorian calendar.

The tenth day of Muharram is known as the Day of Ashura, part of the Mourning of Muharram for Shia Muslims and a day of fasting for Sunni Muslims. The practice of fasting during Ashura stems from the hadith[2] that Musa (Moses) and his people obtained a victory over the Egyptian Pharaoh on the 10th day of Muharram

title: Expose: Photo Editing w/ Live Background & Overlay
description:
Boost your pictures with animated glitch effects and moving filters! Whether you shot a portrait of your friend, or did a quick selfie in the mirror, our moving effects and live background animations will elevate your photos! It's super easy: add your image, pick a filter, and share your masterpiece. Improving your social media game was never this easy! Our quick photo editor will do the heavy lifting for you: our AI will automatically select the foreground, no need for manual masking. You can choose presets in different categories, like Glitch, Lights, Cyberpunk, Drip Art, and Live Background. Select the filter that best fits your photo's mood. You can fine-tune the details of the filters and effects to get perfect posts and stories for TikTok, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
We have an effect and background for every occasion. You can express your love for a film or series with our overlays, share your interest in a cyberpunk style future or simply add a retro effect to an otherwise simple picture!
Your photos + our photo editing app will leave your followers speechless! 
We all love short videos. However, some precious moments can't be expressed with them. This is why we created Expose: it helps you say everything with just  a photo and a matchy effect to create mind-blowing videos of them. Expose your creative side and make something artistic.

This is the new photo editor app from the VIMAGE team. It's like VIMAGE app for lazies: neon effects, contemporary filters, and groovy templates, right at your fingertips.

Here are the filters you can choose from:
LIVE BACKGROUND
GLITCH

OVERLAYS
LIGHTS
CYBERPUNK

This list is not exhaustive; come and discover the features within the app!

We're sure the creations made with Expose are the ones you want to show your family, friends, followers, everyone, they will love them!

Expose is free to use, in-app purchases are available. Become a PRO user to get access to all features now, and even more in the future.

PRO features* include effects like Film, Split, Gradient and many more. 


For tech support or any questions or suggestions, email us: expose@vimageapp.com
descriptionHTML:
Boost your pictures with animated glitch effects and moving filters! Whether you shot a portrait of your friend, or did a quick selfie in the mirror, our moving effects and live background animations will elevate your photos! It's super easy: add your image, pick a filter, and share your masterpiece. Improving your social media game was never this easy! Our quick photo editor will do the heavy lifting for you: our AI will automatically select the foreground, no need for manual masking. You can choose presets in different categories, like Glitch, Lights, Cyberpunk, Drip Art, and Live Background. Select the filter that best fits your photo's mood. You can fine-tune the details of the filters and effects to get perfect posts and stories for TikTok, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
We have an effect and background for every occasion. You can express your love for a film or series with our overlays, share your interest in a cyberpunk style future or simply add a retro effect to an otherwise simple picture!
Your photos + our photo editing app will leave your followers speechless!
We all love short videos. However, some precious moments can't be expressed with them. This is why we created Expose: it helps you say everything with just a photo and a matchy effect to create mind-blowing videos of them. Expose your creative side and make something artistic.

This is the new photo editor app from the VIMAGE team. It's like VIMAGE app for lazies: neon effects, contemporary filters, and groovy templates, right at your fingertips.

Here are the filters you can choose from:
LIVE BACKGROUND
GLITCH

OVERLAYS
LIGHTS
CYBERPUNK

This list is not exhaustive; come and discover the features within the app!

We're sure the creations made with Expose are the ones you want to show your family, friends, followers, everyone, they will love them!

Expose is free to use, in-app purchases are available. Become a PRO user to get access to all features now, and even more in the future.

PRO features* include effects like Film, Split, Gradient and many more.


For tech support or any questions or suggestions, email us: expose@vimageapp.com
summary: Up your photography game with moving filters, motion effects & presets by VIMAGE
recentChanges:
Get retro vibes with the new Live Background presets:
-80s Space
-Retro sunrise
-King's Gambit
Featured tab on dashboard
Remove watermark functionality
Internal improvements and bugfixes
comments: Not many effects to use and no way to edit or add. Not much to it. And it puts a huge "Expose" on your picture, which is unflattering and tacky. Just like the Vimage app does. Grr...I am a photographer and I try out lots of different editing apps. I thought this would offer more. These days, you really have to. This COULD be really cool.

The app works excellently and easily but the options are very limited. Review Update for developer: Keep doing what you're doing, essentially but more. There are other apps doing very similar things (the neon triangle effect for example) that dont do it as well as you do but they have have dozens of different shapes or wings or whatever that u can blend with the photo. As I've already played with those ones, and recently, I'm not finding many avenues to explore despite my desire.

Very cool dimensions to explore with photographs... ...Most of the Filters in this app are so intense you experience a real transformation by editing... Academy Award worthy! It's something to write home about. 10 thumbs up!!!
Love love LOVE this app!!!! It has some of the coolest features and is SO easy to use! Thanks to the makers! Thanks for allowing me to turn my regular photos into badass photos!
It's still my first day using this app but I am really satisfied with the service it's rendering

comments: It took the money for the year membership before the free trial ended. I didn't even use the app, I cancelled and uninstalled before the payment date. I've been trying to reach the developer (as instructed by Google) with no response now for over a month. Do not download.

Very bad app, totally not worth the price. If you dont EXACTLY mimic the pose in the EXACT distance and angle then it looks extremely horrible. If it was 100% free, I could let it slide but charging 50 dollar a year or 20 dollar a month for this POS is just shameful.

Been charged for this app that I intialy didn't want. My son clicked by mistake on one tap PayPal buy and I received notification of the purchase and asked for refund but no refund was issued. This is a scam . Don't be fooled like hundreds of people who mistakenly paid for this junk app!

The work it wants you to put in is over the top like you have to mimic it one by one or it doesnt look good i love the app and its really cool when you mimic it correctly but the main problem is that once the vid is done you should make it so that you can control/move the effect if it isnt in the right spot and make correct it would also be good if the effects go behind me rather than in front like the wall punching one gets ruined cus i cant get the right spot cus my hand is behind the wall

I've been charged since 2000 and never even looked at the app it says expires in 2022 I've still never seen the app I don't know why I had to pay about 50 bucks for the subscription and I have for years already I think it's a bunch of entrapment bullcrap whoever created this app and put it on for free should be drug out in the street and shot in the nuts repeatedly

title: Muharram Photo Frames
description:
Ashura also known as Yawm e Ashura (Arabic: يَوْم عَاشُورَاء‎) is the tenth day of Muharram, the first month in the Islamic calendar.[4] For Muslims Ashura marks the day that Moses and the Israelites were saved from Pharaoh by God creating a path in the Sea.The World Sunni Movement celebrates this day as National Martyrs' Day of Muslim nation under the direction of Syed Imam Hayat.[9] Also for Muslims, it marks the day that Husayn ibn Ali, the grandson of the Islamic prophet Muhammad, was martyred in the Battle of Karbala.Ashura is a major holy day and occasion for pilgrimage in Shia Islam,as well as a recommended but non-obligatory day of fasting in Sunni Islam.
By "MUHARAM PHOTO FRAMES" make your beautiful ashura day frames with lot of HD Ashura Muharam frames.
You can selct your picture from camera or gallery
Crop scale and zoom your picture
Select any hd ashura muharam frame
This app contains lot of Ashura Day frames
Also can select 10 muhram frames from this app
Fit your picture in beautiful 10 muharam frame
Select any beautiful ashura sticker ,muharam sticker 10 muharam sticker from this muharam app
Set beautiful ashura muharam sticker on Muharam frames
Click on save button and save 10 muharam photo frame  in your mobile
You can also view from app local ashura muharam gallery within the app
Select any hd ashura muharam frame and share it to your social media circles
You can also set Muharram wallpaper by the app
Click on wallpaper button and set your mobile home screen with beatiful hd ashura muharam wallpaper

title: GuruShots - Photography Game
description:
Love taking photos? Join daily photo challenges, get instant feedback, improve your photography & get rewarded. Join for Free!

Team up and take on challenges together! Join a team or create your own, Participate in Team vs Team matches, chat with other members, and see track your Team score in real-time. GuruShots, The first-of-its-kind photo app for photographers of all levels, reinvents the way people interact with their photos, making it more fun, exciting and rewarding.

+ It’s fun, social and helps improve photography skills.
+ Enjoy daily themed photo challenges.
+ Get Instant Feedback on your pictures from over 6 billion Monthly Votes.
+ See how you rank compared to others in Real-time.
+ Win amazing prizes; Over $800K in prizes.
+ Gain massive exposure: Get featured in magazines, online and in international photo exhibitions!
+ FREE to join & easy to get started.

Ready to show off your creative images? Download our photo app now and join a community of millions around the world who are already hooked!

NEW PHOTO CHALLENGES EVERY DAY
Whether you like taking photos with a DSLR camera or your Mobile phone, share photos in our themed photo competitions, from “Black and White” to “Beards”, capture fresh pictures or dust off shots you already have.

INSTANT FEEDBACK
With instant photos feedback from over 6 billion monthly votes, GuruShots photographers gain affirmation and inspiration on their photography that even surprises themselves with their creativity and progress.

REAL-TIME RANKING
The power of the crowd rates pictures instantly; our photography app enables members to see which photos rank highest, compare their photographs to others, and follow their ranking in real-time.

HAVE AMAZING FUN WITH YOUR PHOTOS
Get ready for the most exciting photography app! Compete in daily photo challenges and work your way up from Newbie to Guru status by receiving peer votes, points, and achievements.
Swap your photographs to see which one works best; use Boosts, Fills and Keys to receive maximum exposure.

IMPROVE YOUR PHOTOGRAPHY SKILLS
Experiment with your photos and find out which of them are WOW. 
Discover what's popular, get fresh ideas and receive awesome insights. As you level up in the photo game, you will find yourself improving your photography skills, too.

MAKE YOUR PHOTOS MORE MEANINGFUL
Gain massive exposure for your photos and earn badges that demonstrate your achievements. Get meaningful recognition and appreciation for your creative photography by being featured in magazines and online - and even in international photo exhibitions!

APPEAR IN AN INTERNATIONAL PHOTO EXHIBITIONS
From New York to Singapore, London to Cape Town, and beyond. About 5,000 GuruShots photographers are recognized each month, with tens of thousands already exhibited. Now, you have the opportunity to get recognized, submit your photos to one of our photo contests for the chance to showcase your work in international photo exhibitions and connect with like-minded photographers.

WIN AMAZING PRIZES
Top GuruShots community members have the chance to snag prizes, from in-game power-ups to photography gear and gift cards. Members cast over 5 billion monthly votes in 500+ photo contests, winning $600k+ in prizes.

Tap into a fast-growing community of millions of creative people like you who simply love taking pictures!

ANYONE CAN JOIN
Suitable for anyone who's passionate about photography at any level from Mobile Photographers to DSLR Photographers.

Download the World’s #1 photography app now and play for FREE!

Experiment with your photos and find out which of them are WOW.
Discover what's popular, get fresh ideas and receive awesome insights. As you level up in the photo game, you will find yourself improving your photography skills, too.

MAKE YOUR PHOTOS MORE MEANINGFUL


Gain massive exposure for your photos and earn badges that demonstrate your achievements. Get meaningful recognition and appreciation for your creative photography by being featured in magazines and online - and even in international photo exhibitions!

APPEAR IN AN INTERNATIONAL PHOTO EXHIBITIONS


From New York to Singapore, London to Cape Town, and beyond. About 5,000 GuruShots photographers are recognized each month, with tens of thousands already exhibited. Now, you have the opportunity to get recognized, submit your photos to one of our photo contests for the chance to showcase your work in international photo exhibitions and connect with like-minded photographers.

WIN AMAZING PRIZES


Top GuruShots community members have the chance to snag prizes, from in-game power-ups to photography gear and gift cards. Members cast over 5 billion monthly votes in 500+ photo contests, winning $600k+ in prizes.

Tap into a fast-growing community of millions of creative people like you who simply love taking pictures!

ANYONE CAN JOIN


Suitable for anyone who's passionate about photography at any level from Mobile Photographers to DSLR Photographers.

Download the World’s #1 photography app now and play for FREE!
summary: Join the amazing photo game. Snap a photo have fun & improve your skills.
recentChanges: New flow for end of Challenges: Instead of popups we have created a new page with previously ended Challenges and their information.
comments: Trouble uploading photos. Update looks worse, bit confusing at first and makes less sense as well, not nearly as visual which is literally the point of the app, had trouble with account so had to start all over and make a new account twice, and with so many people on there now I can't get back to my master level I had. I do not recommend if you want to be encouraged. It's not encouraging anymore. 😕 challenges are pretty much the same now, and just far to many people for that.

I sent you an email describing the error. I'm afraid that I will be deactivating my account if a much simpler way of uploading a pic is not introduced soon. I have been your client since early 2017, but with each update, it becomes more and more frustrating to get a pic uploaded. Your app has lost its joy. EDIT TO ADD:::: Nevermind, I deleted my account and uninstalled this app. I have had it with you amateurs.

GuruShots is like Instagram, but on crack but instead you actually get votes and likes. having a pretty substantial photo gallery of all things at a high quality photo resolution is very helpful, if you are just starting out though, that's also fine but you should not expect to be a guru anytime soon. I've learned from this app and my time using it over two years, luck is definitely involved but it is also important to have decent photographs and making sure they match the challenge.

Too much pay to play/pay to win. Support staff has no idea what they're doing. I've seen people win competitions with the exact same subject in 3 out of 4 photos and support does nothing and denies that was the case. I've had photographs flagged as off-topic when they weren't, support does nothing then either. I imagine if I spent money I would be treated differently.

It's a fun way to spend some relaxing time, looking at beautiful photos, finding inspiration. The only hiccup for me is when my fun time is interrupted by awful images made by ppl who clearly have no idea what photography is supposed to be like. And I don't mean the cases where it's about a matter of taste or preference, heck, even the lack of experience is okay when it's clear someone is at least trying, but I've came across random selfies, typical family photos and even schreenshots of images.

title: Inmate Photos, Send Photo Prints to Jail
description:
Remind your incarcerated friend or loved one that they are not forgotten by sending photos to them when they are in jail, a corrections institution, or a BOP or state prison. Ordering photos within our app is easy and takes just a few minutes.

It is very easy to use our app: 
* Sign up using your email address, Google, Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter account
* Specify the inmate you intend to send photos to by entering their federal BOP register number or by selecting the state, facility, and ID number for the jail they are at
* Read and understand the rules of the jail or prison that you selected 
* Upload photos from your device, Facebook, Google, or Instagram 
* Add a personalized message 
* Confirm your address, so the facility knows where to send any photos that violate their rules to
* Place your order

While we do not send cards, videos, organize visits, or transfer money, our focus is to make sending pictures easy and affordable. 

While Securus, Corrlinks, and jPay print photos in black and white ink on plain copy paper, Inmate Photos will connect the inmate with a high-quality professional print in full-color. Freeprints services charge up to $9.99 for shipping. Our shipping charge is never more than $4.50. 

All inmates receive a mugshot when they arrive at a facility, but that is the only photo they will receive outside of a civilian sending them photos.

Pictures sent by you can cheer up the people in your network of friends and loved ones who are at a low point in their life. Being a pen-pal and sending photos can really help put an inmate in a better state of mind and remind them that you care. 

The United States houses 2.2 million inmates, which is 25% of the world’s incarcerated population. We are a service for imprisoned people, their friends, and their relatives. 

Prisons have rules and regulations about delivering physical items to the inmates. We help you comply with those rules and ensure that the photos get delivered to the inmate.
We currently service all federal facilities and are constantly adding state prisons and county and city jails.

comments: Brilliant! But sometimes the head cropping is a bit too extreme and you lose part of beard, neck, hair. Would love to be able to extend the cropping a bit.
This app is wonderful! I like all the different features it offers and it's fun! I do wish you could do more than 1 face in a picture though.
Really great but I wish it was more accurate with eye colors. Even when the picture of someone clearly has brown eyes it makes them green

Amazing app. I love the 3d avatars that u can create, and the 15th century ones. With most photos, the cartoons look awesome and very realistic, but with a few they look poor quality and extremely unrealistic. Please fix this issue!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Also, it would be AMAZING and surely 5 star rating worthy if you could make it so you can do the ALL effects on more than one person in a photo, and so it actually has good quality (unlike several other apps I have tried). Overall, this app is great!
Very easy to use. I only wish more than one face in the picture could be cartoonized.

title: Picas - Art Photo Filter, Picture Filter
description:
Picas has been featured twice on Play Store as Google editor's choice! Picas is a free art photo filter & editor. It can turn every of your photo & picture into awesome artworks within 10s! With deep neural networks and artificial intelligence, Picas offers more than 100 amazing artistic filters and styles for enhancing photo & picture effects. 


"For photo art, Picas lets you quickly and easily upload an image and then apply a cool filter. "  ---Makeuseof

"Picas for Android allows you to add a touch of artistry and imagination to your photo images. Easily turn your images into mini works of art with deep neural networks and artificial intelligence. It has more than 100 unusual artistic filters and styles to enhance your photos. "  ----Majorgeeks

"This one adds to the portfolio of turn your picture into a painting. If you enjoy those, you might want to play with an extra set of filters." --PhoneArena

What makes Picas outstanding:

Be an artist and create art with AI
Picas transforms photos, pictures and selfies into famous fine art paintings with the help of artificial intelligence and deep neural network algorithm.

We’ve improved the algorithm of facial recognition which will make perfect filtered portrait and selfie. It is very helpful for users who want enhance social media presence.

title: Chatbooks - Print Monthly Photo Books
description:
Get your photos off your phone and into your hands with the Chatbooks app! It’s never been easier to print all your family photos into a collection of beautiful photo books. 
Our bestselling 5x7” Monthbooks are designed to show off the everyday photos you take on your phone. Start a Monthbooks subscription to get a new 30-page photo book every month. Add photos right from your phone camera roll in the Chatbooks app, edit, and send to print in just a few taps. Cancel anytime and always get free shipping on any Chatbooks photo book subscription. 
Chatbooks photo books offer softcover or hardcover options, a range of sizes from 6x6” to 10x10”, and several chic spine and cover colors and designs. Add a contributor for a photo book that includes everyone’s photos that your whole family will love. Photo books make swoon-worthy personalized decor: start a collection today to style the ultimate shelfie. Plus, free shipping options are available on all products in the U.S.! 
It’s seriously beyond easy to create Chatbooks. Buzzfeed says: “You can have a beautiful book in minutes.” Millions of Chatbookers use the Chatbooks app to print their photos—join them!

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I really enjoy this app in general. The idea behind it, layout, and simplicity are all really great. However, it still needs a lot of work with the glitching issues. My progress would get halted fairly often by the app simply stopping allowing me to edit anymore, and at checkout it would not let me select PayPal as a payment method. If you could get these types of glitches resolved I would really love using it!

The service of chat books itself is amazing and such a great deal, however the app itself is so glitchy. I've had multiple times where I couldn't get all of my photos to work , one time it wouldn't send to print without talking to customer service a bunch, I've had the app freeze and crash a ton. If I ever put the wrong photo and want to switch it, it won't ever let me, it's very frustrating sometimes. I wish they'd make the app run better and then it would be an amazing service overall
LOOOOVE this app! Such an easy way to print and organize your pictures. And the covers are so pretty!
These photo books are just perfect. I can collect and keep all my photos together without having to by albums or worry about pictures getting lost.
Was incredibly easy to add photos, add captions, and looked very professional. Definitely will be using this again.

title: Gallery - Photo Album & Gallery Slideshow
description:
Gallery is smart, fast, lightweight and the most stable gallery app for viewing and organizing your photo, videos, album, GIF. Protect your private photos and videos using Pin Lock or Password Lock, hide secret photo, organize them and display as slide-show style! Gallery is smart gallery, private gallery, collection gallery, photo gallery!

💯 Automatic organization
Find photos faster with automatic organization. Arrange order of gallery items based on your selection. Gallery helps you stay organized, so you can quickly find your favorite moments, and share memories with your family and friends.

🎨 Auto-enhance and quick editing
Gallery has easy to use photo editing tools, such as auto-enhance which will make your photos look their best with one-tap. Crop, Rotate, Quick adjust, adjust color, add exclusive filters, doodle, add clip arts and more.
Video Trimmer & Video Cutter helps you easily cut & trim video as you want.

🎆 Key Features for Gallery
* Beautiful simple and fast photo gallery
* Fast and quickly search pictures, GIF, videos and albums
* Fastest photo & videos viewer
* Renamed, shared, deleted,favorites, copied, edit,moved
* Create and manage photo albums
* Set as Wallpaper
* Photo slideshow
* Photo Editor
* Folders and SD Card support, use folders to organize photos.
* Works offline, all in a small app size
* Easy to share and post on Facebook,Twitter,Flickr

🌌 Photo Gallery
Photo Gallery can be sorted by date, size, name both ascending or descending, photos can be zoomed in!

🔒 Gallery Lock - Hide Pictures And Videos
Gallery Lock hide pictures and videos keep keep your privacy absolutely safe. 

Gallery is the well-designed gallery replacement for the built-in phone gallery!

title: Picsart Photo Editor: Pic, Video & Collage Maker
description:
Join the Picsart community of over 150 million creators around the world. With the Picsart photo editor and video editor, you can bring your creativity to life. Make professional-level collages, design and add stickers, quickly remove and swap backgrounds, try popular edits like Golden Hour, Mirror Selfies, and retro VHS or Y2K filters. Picsart is your go-to, all-in-one editor with all the tools you need to give your content a personal flair and make it stand out. 

Picsart Features:

PHOTO EDITOR
• Try trending filters for pictures and popular photo effects
• Use the Background Eraser to erase and replace backgrounds
• Clean up pictures and remove unwanted objects with the Remove Object tool
• Use millions of curated, free images or edit your own pictures
• Add text to photos with 200+ designer fonts
• Retouch selfies with hair color changer, makeup stickers & more
• Blur backgrounds with our AI-powered smart selection tool
• Quickly flip & crop photos
• Add stickers to pictures and create your own stickers

VIDEO EDITOR
• Create and edit videos with our easy-to-use video editor with music
• Take your IG Stories, TikToks & Reels to the next level 
• Add music to your videos using our extensive video editor music library
• Crop video clips to the perfect dimensions and ratios
• Try Glitch video effects and other trendy filters in the video editor
• Trim videos or use smart video merger to blend videos
• Design using the slideshow maker with music
• Add your best moments to a video collage

COLLAGE MAKER
• Create on-trend photo collages with your favorite pictures
• Try photo grid collage, freestyle collage, scrapbook, and frames for pictures
• Go viral with our meme generator & share with friends
• Use the Story Maker and level up your Instagram game with Story templates

STICKER MAKER + FREE STICKERS
• Discover over 60+ million Picsart stickers
• Add stickers to pictures to turn up the fun level on your edits
• Download any sticker for free and use it instantly
• Make your own clipart and create unique custom stickers

PHOTO EFFECTS & FILTERS
• Outline selfies with the popular Sketch effects
• Turn portraits into artistic masterpieces with Canvas effects
• Make Drip Art with dripping effect stickers & customize the blend mode
• Cartoon yourself in seconds with amazing Magic effects

DRAWING TOOL
• Use Picsart Draw with customizable brushes, layers, & pro drawing tools
• Doodle on pictures and create a transparent clothes effect
• Start with a blank canvas to create art and illustrations from scratch
• Play with Doodle Art and scribble away for hours

REPLAY

Picsart is your go-to, all-in-one editor with all the tools you need to give your content a personal flair and make it stand out.

PHOTO EDITOR

comments: Disappointed with this app. I've been using it for 7+ years and it used to be my go-to photo editing app. The addition of Gold was initially fine, but they kept pushing ads for it literally everywhere. And now, a ton of features which used to be *free* (up until literally a month ago) can now only be used if you purchase the Gold membership. Absolutely ridiculous.

I'm so sad about the latest update! I used to have a quick way to edit my pics by altering just the saturation, shadows and highlights. It was perfect. Now when I do the exact same thing it comes out looking nothing like it used to! I'm so sad bcos I have the paid version and I put so much time & effort into my pics for insta & things and that nifty trick was such a vibe....... please change it back so I can make this a good review :(

I use PicsArt Gold and the resources available are great, especially the fonts. What's been bothering me a lot is that I can't save them anymore. I've tried uninstalling and installing again, moved from external to internal storage, even used it on other devices, but that's always it: I download the fonts, but when I go back to the app later, they're not there anymore, and I need to search for them again every time I want to use em. It's awful pay for the service when it doesn't work, seriously.

This app is perfect for you, it has video editing, photo editing, a gallery where you can see others work, its very good. However, when im editing a video some things just crash the whole app and restart it. I try and try again, but it doesn't stop. This is very annoying because other apps don't have the features I need like this one, but those features always crash. One of the main ones is "add photo." Wen I click on one part of the video, I try to add a photo but it crashes. Please fix it.

Ok this app is really good for editings and everything! I don't have a complain about anything but recently i'm having a problem in it which is i don't have the 'shape crop' option available now, i had it before but after the update version i can't find it! I really need it for editing so it would be really good if you can fix this problem! Please make the 'shape crop' option inable again in my picsart app and without that this app it amazing! Thank you! ❤️

title: Photo Prints+ 1 Hour Walmart Photo Prints
description:
Walmart Photo Prints. Low Prices. 1 Hour Pickup!
 
- 25¢ 4x6 Prints! 
- 4x6,5x7,8x10 Sizes Available
- Wallet Size Prints
- Local Walmart Pickup
- Easy Kiosk Photo Transfer
- High Quality 1-Hour Prints
- Premium Fujifilm Paper
 
Order photo prints at your local Walmart directly from your phone. Pay on pickup at a Walmart Digital Photo Center near you. Featuring premium Fuji photo paper!
 
Print from Instagram:  Choose images directly from you Instagram account and print locally.
 
Print from Facebook: Select your favorite social media images from any picture you’ve uploaded to Facebook.
 
Print from Dropbox: Easily connect to file sharing specialist Dropbox and choose images for printing.
 
Print from Twitter: Search by hashtag.  Print your favorite memes!
 
Print from Flickr: Simple account connection enables printing of any photograph uploaded to Flickr.
 
Print from Google: Choose photos from your Google account directly from your phone.
 
 
LOW PRICES: Create prints and custom photo gifts with everyday low prices. High quality Fujifilm 4x6” photo prints are just 25 cents each – and are ready for pickup in just 1 hour. Bring your photo prints to life with hand crafted high quality Fujifilm digital photo prints and enlargements.
 
EASY KIOSK PHOTO TRANSFER: With Photo Prints+ you can order photo prints from your phone when and where you like. No in-store kiosk photo transfer app is needed. A Walmart photo center account is not required. Wirelessly print pictures straight from your phone. Easily upload photos to Walmart and shop for photo prints and gifts with ease.
 
WALMART PICKUP NEAR YOU: The Photo Prints+ Walmart store finder will automatically locate your nearest Walmart Digital Photo Center - making it super simple to order photo prints near you. Search for a photo lab nearby or find the Walmart store that suits you best. Easily find your nearest Walmart and pay in-store when you pickup. With hundreds of Walmart digital photo print centers across the USA, you can enjoy photo printing with local pickup and no shipping costs.
 
WALMART PHOTO PRINTS in 1-HOUR: Enjoy same-day pickup of your photo print order. Walmart photo prints are available in a range of sizes and quantities. Prints & enlargements are ready in just 1 hour.
 
PREMIUM QUALITY PRINTS: Your Walmart photo order will be lovingly produced using high quality Fujifilm photo print paper. Walmart photo offers high quality prints for low prices.
 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Walmart and Wal-Mart are registered trademarks of Walmart Inc. Photo Prints+ is a trademark of MEA Mobile Limited.
 
CUSTOMER SERVICE
At Photo Prints+ we are dedicated to helping you enjoy your cherished memories in print. Our dedicated customer support team is here to help. Just get in touch.
 
support@photoprints.app

comments: I have used app many times and I have not had one problem with it since I've been using it. I know people that have several of them installed on their phones because they don't work right or don't have the same features but this one is absolutely perfect for me 🙋‍♀️and what I need. I rate it five stars⭐⭐⭐⭐ ⭐because by 10:00 a.m. the next morning 🌞if not sooner my pictures are already printed and ready for me to pick up.

I love how easy this app is to use! I wish I'd known about it sooner! I've been using it to print photos from my phone and cloud and my friend's to make collages, scrapbook pictures/books, and other creative items. The ease and convenience as well as the low price is remarkable!

It has been amazing for me! As a senior adult it was getting harder & harder to make myself go to the store & sit for so long at a photo kiosk to print my pictures! I always had an issue & would have to get help from an associate!
All the reviews sounded wonderful. However, I spent an hour selecting approximately 150 photos, which were indicated in my cart. When I went to checkout, only FIVE photos were in my cart.

I just downloaded this app!! I previously downloaded a CVS photo app. I was excited and thrilled to see Walmart has an online photo app as well!!*😃👍* I downloaded the CVS photo app when I was visiting my Mom who lives 5 and a half hours away because she lives very near a 24 hour CVS!!* But where I live up here with my husband, there are no CVS stores. There is a Walmart however only a half hour away!!* So now I can order pictures I want printed out from my phone and pick them up at Walmart!!*

title: FreePrints – Print Your Photos for Free
description:
Print photos quickly, easily and for FREE with the world’s #1 photo printing app! 
No subscriptions. No commitments.™ Just free prints! 

Ordering your free prints couldn’t be easier. Just open the app and select photos from your phone, Facebook, Instagram and more. Then choose your quantities and you’re done! Your free prints arrive on your doorstep in just days – and all you pay is a small shipping charge. 

Order up to 85 FREE 4x6 photo prints a month. That’s 1,000 FREE prints a year! And order other sizes for next to nothing. We print your photos on your choice of deluxe glossy or premium matte photo paper. And at FreePrints® we only use Fujifilm photo paper for the best prints possible. 

We promise vivid color reproduction, brilliant whites and fade-free images. And with standard shipping and handling charges starting at just $1.99 (and never more than $9.99, regardless of order size), you simply can’t go wrong. 

What do I get for free? 
• Up to 85 4x6 prints per month – 1,000 per year 
• Limit 1 print per photo 

What do I pay for? 
• Additional 4x6 photo prints 
• Enlargements (We offer 5x5, 5x7, 8x10, 11x14, 12x18, 16x20 and 20x30) 
• Shipping and handling – Standard shipping starts at just $1.99 and never goes above $9.99, no matter how many prints you order 

Why is FreePrints so popular? 
• It’s the fastest, easiest and most affordable way to print photos from your phone or tablet 
• Choice of deluxe glossy or premium matte photo paper 
• Easily print photos from Facebook, Instagram, Dropbox, Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive 
• Print photos and get them delivered to your door in just a few days! 
• FreePrints is the world’s most trusted and best rated photo printing app 
At FreePrints we know how important it is to preserve life’s special moments. Having physical photos of your favorite memories means so much more than having them stuck on your phone. 

With more than 1,000,000 5 star reviews worldwide, our customers show us how much they truly love FreePrints!

What happens to my photos after you print them? 
We store your photos, in accordance with our terms of use, so that you can use them for other orders in the future if you wish, using FreePrints or our other apps. Your photos are always your photos; only you will have access to them. And we use best-of-breed security solutions to ensure that your photos are always protected. More specifics are available in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

About FreePrints 
In a mobile world, all of our most important photos live on our phones and tablets, and yet there was never an easy way to get them printed. After one too many fights with USB sticks, photo kiosks and unreliable websites, we set out to solve this problem: Enter FreePrints. With just a few taps, you can select your favorite photos and have them headed straight to your mailbox. And best of all: They’re free! Millions of customers and countless stories later, we are honored to have touched so many lives. 

From our humble beginnings as a photo lab in Midland, Texas, we’ve grown FreePrints into the top-ranked photo printing app in the world. And if you like FreePrints, you’ll love our other apps: FreePrints Photobooks®, FreePrints Photo Tiles®, and FreePrints Gifts™, all providing free products for just a nominal delivery charge, with no subscriptions or commitments. 

Copyright © 2012-2021 PlanetArt, LLC. All rights reserved. FreePrints and the FreePrints logo are registered trademarks of PlanetArt, LLC.

comments: I was initially impressed. 85 free prints & i just paid shipping! Then after my first order, I had a pop up stating that I earned a free picture blanket. Awesome! We were so excited. I went through & added the 10 pictures & personalized the text. As the app was uploading the pictures, it popped up telling me it couldn't load. I tried to refresh, go back, nothing. So when I went back in to the app, the offer was gone. I contacted the company & they stated there was nothing they could do.

I really truly love this app, and I don't think I could say that about any other app lol. I try to take advantage of this awesome deal every month, but sometimes life gets busy and I forget. The months I do remember to claim my prints I am SO happy. Nothing beats having your favorite photos printed, in my opinion. The pictures are great quality, shipping is always fast and the app is very user-friendly. I recommend this app to all of my friends!

When it seems like nothing is free and there are hidden costs in everything, this company is such a relief. I just got 10 free prints today (free shipping too, and never had to put a credit card) and they are excellent quality. The app is clear about what is free and what is paid for, and has reasonable shipping fees and plenty of free stuff.
This app is AMAZING!!! When they say the first 10 photos are free, they mean it! Not only did my order come in 4 or 5 days early, the quality is near perfect!! Great job!

I ordered the 85 photos and they all look amazing. Shipping took over a month but it was worth it I was literally so happy with my order. I assumed it got lost in the mail since it took so long so I contacted support and they were very nice and willing to help and resent them. Mine arrived and I assume the same batch will arrive again bu it's ok, I'll give them to a friend. I'm really happy just shipping takes forever but it's worth it

تهنئة رأس السنة الهجرية 1443- 2021 مكتوبة ومصورة تطبيق يمكنك من الحصول على عبارات جميلة لتهنئة اصدقائك واحبائك براس السنة الهجرية الجديدة 1443 - 2021 وايضا مجموعة صور للتهنئة براس السنة الهجرية الجديدة 1443 - 2021
ويحتوي تطبيق تهنئة رأس السنة الهجرية 1443 - 2021 مكتوبة ومصورة على معلومات عن السنة الهجرية وسبب اعتماد التقويم الهجري والدول التي كانت تعتمد التقويم الهجري قبل الانتقال للتقويم الميلادي
تهنئة رأس السنة الهجرية 1443 - 2021 مكتوبة ومصورة يشرح ايضا سبب تسمية الشهور الهجرية بهذا الاسم وكيف يبدأ الشهر في السنة الهجرية

تهنئة رأس السنة الهجرية 1443 - 2021 مكتوبة ومصورة يوضح ايضا لماذا تم اختيار شهر محرم بداية للسنة الهجرية ويمكنك من خلال معرفة متى سيكون تاريخ راس السنة الهجرية 1433 - 2021 حسب متابعة الهلال في الدول الاسلامية

كل عام وانتم بخير بمناسبة راس السنة الهجرية الجديدة 1443 - 2021 ونتمنى لكم دوام الصحة والعافية

title: Runaway Aurora Video Effect & Filter Photo Editor
description:
Runaway aurora effect is the most popular filter recently on all social media, runaway aurora filter app allows you to apply the runway effect in your photo easily without any other app, with just one click you can apply the popular filter runaway aurora in your photo.

With the runaway aurora effect app you can make your photo more aesthetic and vaporwave, our app provides a lot of aesthetic backgrounds such as the sunset, the pink sunset, and aurora backgrounds also you will find a big collection of high-quality runaway aurora backgrounds listed in the app, without forgetting the ability to add your own background.

Runaway aurora effect app is a full and powerful runaway aurora effect video maker with song and animations, runaway aurora filter app provides a lot of animation and transitions to animate your video as you like, you can even add your favorite song.

Runaway aurora effect video maker app is your best choice if you want to edit your photo and make a video from it, with simple and easy steps, our app allows you to apply the popular runaway aurora filter to your photo.

Features :

* Automatically background removal, the runaway aurora filter app provides the ability to remove the background from any photo automatically, thanks to our ia that can help you to automatically detect and remove the unwanted background.

* Manually background removal, with our app you always remove the background manually if you don't satisfy with automatically background removal result, with few clicks here and there, you can remove your background from your photo easily.

* Big collection of high-quality backgrounds, runaway aurora provides a big collection of hd aurora backgrounds you can choose whatever you like.

* Save images or videos with one click you can save your edited image quickly.

* Save your photo as a video, our app provide the ability to apply the runaway aurora effect video.

* Capture photo from camera, the runaway aurora video filter app allows you to take a picture from your camera and applying the runaway aurora filter instantly

How to use :

* Firstly first, select your photo.
* Automatically background removal will remove the background for you in just 1 second.
* If you are satisfied with the result, click on the checkmark icon in the top right corner, otherwise you can always use the manual background removal option.
* After that, select your favorite background.
* Click on the save icon to save your edited picture to your gallery.
* If you want to make a runaway aurora effect video, just click on the song icon, then the runaway aurora app will generate an aesthetic video for you, you can select your favorite animation or transitions to apply it to your runaway aurora effect video.

title: MOLDIV - Photo Editor, Collage & Beauty Camera
description:
MOLDIV™ is the all-in-one photo editor that offers everything you could wish for in photography. 
It’s the professional photo editor that satisfies everyone from newbies to professionals. Whether it’s Frame/Collage/Magazine features that allow the liveliest story-telling, or Beauty Camera that takes naturally beautiful selfies, find the features you need in MOLDIV, the best photography app!

• 190+ Filters in 13 Themes — Photographer Favorite!
• Professional Photo Editing Tools
• Design Tools: Text, Stickers, Background Patterns
• Collage: Combine up to 9 photos in a single frame
• Magazine: Collage your photos like a magazine, a poster, or a themed album
• Pro Camera: Live Filters, Photo Booth, Powerful Camera Options
• Perfect Your Selfie: Beauty Filters and Smooth Skin

PROFESSIONAL PHOTO EDITOR
194 Filters in 13 themes beloved by professional photographers
FILM - analog photo effects
Textures that subtly brings all kinds of mood and Light Leaks
Professional editing tools
Text function with 100+ fonts
560 Stickers and 90 Background Patterns
Square for Instagram

COLLAGE
Combine up to 9 photos in a single frame
194 stylish frames
Place and decorate photos as you want in Free Style & Stitch mode
Freely adjust collage aspect ratio
Full variety of design tools

MAGAZINE
Collage your photos like a magazine, a poster, or a themed album
100 popular magazine-style layouts
Magazine presets for the most stylish photo editing 

PRO CAMERA
194 hand-picked quality filters applied in real time
Real-time Blur effect
Photo Booth
Powerful Camera Options:
Silent Shutter, Manual Control of White Balance, Flash control with torch mode, Digital Zoom, Grid, Geo-Tag, Self-Timer, Mirror Mode, Auto Save

BEAUTY CAMERA
Beauty Filters specially designed for perfect selfies
Soften your skin naturally
Adjust the intensity of beauty effects in real time

MORE AWESOME FEATURES 
Edit history: Undo, Redo
Compare with an original photo anytime
EXIF Data
Save to maximum resolution of your device. 
Photo Sharing to Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, Twitter, Flickr etc 

* Don’t forget to Tag #MOLDIV when posting on Instagram. You may find your photos featured on the official @MOLDIVapp! 

Have a question or suggestion? We are waiting for your feedback! 
Facebook: facebook.com/MoldivPro 
Instagram: @MOLDIVapp

[ Permissions ]

- CAMERA
: Grants MOLDIV access to your device's camera to to take photos.

- READ / WRITE EXTERNAL STORAGE
: Permission grants access to your device's external storage, enabling MOLDIV to take, store, and load images.

- ACCESS FINE LOCATION
: Grants MOLDIV access to your device's gps data to to add geo-tag information to the photos you take.
