comments: I still do recommend this app, even if it's not for me. SO Easy to use w TONS of features. This app would be so much better if I could, in the same pinch motion to zoom, tilt pics every which way to make it fit instead of going to the rotate menu to use the degree tilt. I end up doing that 100x before I get it right & usually, it's still not perfect. Also, when I need to scoot a pic over just a little bit - it pulls the menu up every single time... I wish I could've figured that one out too

I have used this app for a very long time. I absolutely love it BUT lately when I chose the EDIT option the app just completely crashes and closes out. What is going on? Are the developers not working on fixing this issue? I have selected to send reports of the crashes several times. Please fix this. I would hate to have to try and find another editor. I only use it for dark photos and to square my photos for profile pictures but this is so annoying.

I used to LOVE This app but then there was a glitch, Whenever i made a college and added a background it kept kicking me out, and i even uninstalled and reinstalled the app but it never worked. Maybe ill change my review if this bug gets fixed.
Its easy to use .. I enjoy it .. I like that you can choose text and write on your photos .. helps to remember when they were taken ..
I don't think it's fair that android has only 180 frames while iOS has over 300. Can we please get some more frames added to android Moldiv.

title: Photo Collage Maker - Remove Background
description:
Just select several pictures, Photo Collage Maker - Remove background instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Unleash your creativity in our photo lab! It’s completely free!

Features:
● Combine up to 18 photos to create pic collage.
● 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from!
● Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
● Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
● Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
● Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
● Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
● Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps.


📷 Grid
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

📷 Edit
All-in-one photo editor provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

📷 Freestyle
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

📷 Story Template
100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper… Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends.

📷 Multi-fit
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 3:2 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Collage Maker is the best photo collage maker, pic stitch and photo editor for Instagram and printing. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photoframecreative@gmail.com

title: Waterfall Photo Frames
description:
This is the right moment to make your pictures look selfie with Waterfall. Download “Waterfall Photo Editor : Waterfall Photo Frames” and apply nice waterfall photo frame for photos. Start your journey through the wonderful world of waterfall photo editor. It offers you a collection of amazing waterfall backgrounds and waterfall frames, inspired with all waterfall photo editor. 

Waterfall Photo Frames make photos stylist and prepare it for your memories and make them unforgettable. Lets frame your photos landscape directions as you like.

Waterfall Photo frames comes with Cut Paste Photo Editor to Paste your photos on Waterfall Photo Backgrounds.
1. Cut your Photos that you want to Appear on Waterfall Backgrounds.
2. Trim the Edges to make sure your photos appear natural on Waterfall Photo Backgrounds.
3. Paste your cut photos against Waterfall Backgrounds.

Write your own text on Frames with different fonts and colors make it more attractive Waterfall photo frame.

Waterfall photo editor has waterfall stickers etc. pictures and stickers. Stickers can be resized, flipped, attached anywhere on your selfies and they will look like original photo taken with waterfall.

Waterfall Photo Frames Features:

♥ Select a photo from the gallery or take photos using the phone or tablet camera.

♥Edit your photo, save it and share on social media.

title: Beauty Pose – Photo posing guide

Over 370 real photo examples with detailed descriptions and recommendations for photographers and models!

You will find the following examples in the app:
- Male and female posing
- Posing in interior photo studios, on the cyclorama, on the street and in nature

- Detailed descriptions and recommendations for posing for models

title: Artisan: Cartoon Photo Editor & Art Photo Filters
description:
Artisan sarjakuva kuvan muokkaus on paras karikatyyriohjelma sarjakuvaan ja digitaalisen taiteen tekemiseen monilla taiteellisilla valokuvasuodattimilla. Käsityöläisten sarjakuvien valmistaja esittelee monia vektoritaitesuodattimia ja karikatyyriefektejä kuvien sarjakuvaamiseksi ja avatarifioimiseksi yhdellä napautuksella. Tee anime-taidetta muuntamalla kuvat maalauksiksi ja sarjakuviksi nyt! Artisan-sarjakuva-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on all-in-one-kuvankäsittelyohjelma, joka tarjoaa henkeäsalpaavia selfie-kameratehosteita kuvien muokkaamiseen, avatarifiointiin ja taiteeseen erilaisilla digitaalisen taiteen suodattimilla. Valmista kuvitus Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, TikTok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi paljon tykkäyksiä!

🎨  Sarjakuva Kuvan Muokkaus: 
Jos sinulla on Artisan-sarjakuvasovellus, et tarvitse muita kuvankäsittelysovelluksia valokuviesi muuntamiseksi sarjakuviksi. Valitse upea kuva kuvagalleriastasi muokattavaksi ja sarjakuvaksi. Tutki öljymaalaussuodattimia ja upeita valokuvatehosteita saadaksesi upean profiilikuvan. Piirrä itseäsi avatar-suodattimilla nähdäksesi itsesi suosikki animaatiohahmosi. Saatavilla on paljon upeita valokuvasuodattimia ja -tehosteita, kuten väri-, luonnos- ja öljymaalaussuodatin kuvien retusointiin. Muuta valokuva sarjakuvaksi  tai mangaksi muutamassa sekunnissa taiteellisen avatar-suodatinsovelluksen ansiosta. Viimeistele kuvankäsittely legendaarisilla memoji-tarroilla, neon-spiraaleilla ja söpöllä tekstillä. Montaasi kuvia kollaasikoneella käyttämällä kauniita valokuvakehyksiä ja tarroja syntymäpäiville, pääsiäiselle ja Halloweenille!

✨  Taiteelliset öljymaalaussuodattimet ja pop-artefektit: 
Artisan-taidetoimittaja on hieno vapauttamaan sisäinen taiteilijasi ja muuttamaan kuvasi taiteellisiksi maalauksiksi käyttämällä taide- ja luonnosefektejä. Sarjakuva-suodattimien lisäksi rakastat lyijykynäsuodatin.

🤳  Selfie-kameran tehosteet: 
Artisan-sarjakuva-sovellus tarjoaa hämmästyttäviä selfie-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita sarjakuvaan itsellesi ilmaiseksi! Ota itsesi taidekameralla ja piirrä itsesi nyt! Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on johtava digitaalisen taiteen sovellus- ja avatar-valmistaja, jolla on kasvojen live-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita.

💥  Mahtavat sarjakuvataustat: 
Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma poistaa täydellisesti taustan, joten voit valita loistavan taustan ja käyttää tippumisvaikutusta! Paljon värikkäitä kuvioita ja väriroiskeita käytettävissä manga-taiteen tekemiseen.

💖  Esteettinen tiputusvaikutus: 
Uskomattomat tippuvat vaikutukset yhdistettynä sarjakuviin. Photoshop-vaikutus vain muutamassa sekunnissa sarjakuvan tekijän ansiosta. Joko hämärtää taustaa tai vaihda se upealla anime-taustakuvalla! Sarjakuvasuodattimiin yhdistettävissä on monia tippuvia vaikutuksia.

😍  Profiilikuvan luoja: 
Piirrä itsesi luomaan upeita avatar-profiilikuvia Artisan-avatar-luojan ja emoji-valmistajan kanssa. Voit lisätä lyijykynän luonnosefektin ja supertaustat tuomaan vielä hauskempaa karikatyyreihisi. Käytä eeppiseen kuvankäsittelyyn sarjakuva muotokuvaeditoria ja hauskaa sarjakuvan valmistajaa. Anime-kuvankäsittelyohjelmassa on kaikkien aikojen paras AI-sarjakuvasuodatin.

Artisan sarjakuva editori on kaikki yhdessä sarjakuva-sovelluksessa, jossa voit animoida kuvia, avatarifioida itsesi sarjakuva-kasvosuodattimilla ja kauniilla piirustussuodattimilla kuville. Liity uuteen memoji-trendiin ja muokkaa valokuvia ammattilaisena Artisanin kanssa saadaksesi vaikutuksen ystäviisi! Valmista henkeäsalpaavia animoituja kuvia Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, Tik Tok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi niin paljon tykkäyksiä.

Great app! Has lots of great looking free filters available. Ads ore not overly intrusive. Filters are applied rather quickly and best of all, I was not asked to provide a review before I had even used the app! Definitely keeping this one installed!
It's awesome. Ads aren't disturbing much. All in all, it's a great app:)

Decent. That's about as good as it gets. Only renders a "usable photo" 1 out of 5 tries. 1. Leaves black marks/blemishes (evidently from shadows) on parts of the picture due to the app's inability to render properly no matter what choice you choose. 2. Better make sure it's a closeup because again the program does a horrid job rendering eyes. A 3yr old could color them in better than this program. Few pros/many cons for an average app which for $55/year should be so much more.

Decent filters, however many of them seem alike to me. I definitely wouldn't want to have to muddle through the 2,000+ offered in the pro version. Still, I would pay for it if the billing weren't automatically recurring. I'm done with apps that want free access to my bank account.

title: عاشوراء خلفيات - حسينية
description:
عاشوراء خلفيات - حسينية برنامج يشرح اشياء كثيرة متعلقة بـ يوم عاشور محرم من صور و معلومات
لا يحتاج الى الاتصال بالانترنت
يضم التطبيق عاشوراء خلفيات - حسينية المواضيع الاتية:
ما هو يوم عاشوراء
عاشوراء هو اليوم العاشر من شهر مُحَرَّم في التقويم الهجري، ويسمى عند المسلمين بيوم عاشوراء وهو اليوم الذي نجّىٰ الله فيه موسى من فرعون ويصادف اليوم الذي قتل فيه الحسين بن علي حفيد النبي محمد في معركة كربلاء، لذلك يعدّه الشيعة يوم عزاء وحزن. كما وقعت العديد من الأحداث التاريخية الأخرى في نفس اليوم. ويعدّ يوم عاشوراء عطلة رسمية في بعض الدول مثل إيران، باكستان، لبنان، البحرين، الهند ،العراق، المغرب والجزائر. ويعدّ صيام يوم عاشوراء سُنة عند أهل السنة والجماعة، وصيامه يُكفّر ذنوب سنة ماضية.
و خلفيات عاشوراء و صور محرم الحرام
أصل التسمية عند الشيعة






يضم التطبيق ايضا عاشوراء في المغرب ، بيوم زمزم.
و المزيد من الاشياء الخاصة عاشوراء خلفيات - حسينية
انه تطبيق لكل شخص يريد صيام يوم عاشوراء و عند أهل السنة


المميزات:
ان التطبيق يعمل بدون نت
الخط واضح و كبير للقراءة
يدعم النسخ و المشاركة و الارسال
يدعم خاصية التكبير و التصغير للنصوص
سهولة الاستخدام و الوصول للمحتوى
تصاميم مميزة
تصميم بواجه بسيطة سهلة جدا

title: Lightleap by Lightricks
description:
Finally, you can take the photo you actually meant to take! Lightleap (formerly Quickshot) is a photo editor that proves you no longer need to be a professional photographer to take amazing photos.

Let’s face it - your photos don't always come out the way you expected. You pull out your phone to capture something awesome, but the photo you take just doesn't do the scene justice. The background is too blurry, the lighting is just all wrong, or maybe the scenery needs a retouch – something only an experienced editor can do, right?

The Lightleap app is here to change that! With this editor app, you can capture the beauty and magic you see with your own eyes – or enhance it. You become the editor with filters, effects, and retouch tools at your fingertips.

There’s no need to spend hours pulling your hair out as you learn how to use professional editor software. The Lightleap image editor app takes moments to retouch your photos into eye-catching images with professional vibes, using stunning pre-set filters and effects.

With unique, easy-to-use features like background Sky, Heal, Effects, Filters and Looks, every photo you take from now on will be picture perfect. If you’ve dreamed of taking Instagram-worthy images to inspire the world, this is your chance.

Brought to you by Lightricks, the award-winning app developer, Lightleap photo editor app is part of the Enlight Creativity Suite, including Pixaloop. We help you harness your creativity in every photo.

App user favourite features from Lightleap include:

Sky
Replace the background in your photos with a brand-new sky!
- With one tap, you can change the background with a new sky.
- Select from 60+ high-quality sky backgrounds.
- Choose from sunny, dusk, sunset, storm, and even fantasy skies!

Heal
Remove unwanted people, background smudges, and easily retouch your image with the heal function, like a true editor.
- Select and erase items in the forefront and background of your image.
- Smooth over bumps and quickly correct photo mistakes.
- Undo retouches with a single tap to restore your image!

Filters
No photo is complete without one of Lightleap's gorgeous filters - one of our top features.
- Find filters by theme, whether you’re looking for warm, black and white, urban, fade and many other filters.
- Easily adjust the intensity of your filters over your image.
- Achieve the effects you desire in moments!

Looks
Change the vibe of your photo like a true editor in one tap.
- Choose a predefined look as filters for your image.
- Create a signature style for your Instagram feed with our designer editor looks.
- Give your images a golden hour glow, or set the mood with dusk, black and white, shadows and fantasy looks.

Effects
Add tons of special effects to retouch dull areas and bring your background to life.
- Overlay shadow effects, sparkles, lens flares and more to enhance your photo.
- Change the weather effects and add seasonal themes.
- Access our extremely popular mood elements and adjust the magic level of your photo effects!

Adjust
The full collection of essential editor tools is at your fingertips.
- Every minor retouch adjustment can be made, including light and contrast to temperature, tint and hue editors.
- Crop your photo, retouch, and edit all within the app.
- Sharpen, adjust the depth, structure, and grain as a professional photography editor!

With Lightleap, you become a photo editor in moments. Fix and retouch your photos with filters and effects to truly capture the magic of the moment you experienced. Download the app to discover how you can become a pro photo editor!

- Terms of use: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
- Privacy policy: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf

title: Who touched my phone? Who unlocked tried to unlock
descriptionHTML:
Application will record those who will use your phone using the front camera in the background mode, invisibly for user. You will see who, when and what did to your favorite device while it is not under your attention.

How does it work?
1) Open app and click the button. Then close the app and lock your device;
2) User unlocked device or tried to do it. The application starts recording a report (photo, list of launched apps);
3) Device screen goes out. App saves report. And so on;
4) User tries to unlock device several times. App saves report;
5) Browse your reports in app. Set up sync with the cloud.

This app uses the Device Administrator permission. The application needs device administrator rights to look out for incorrect unlock attempts. Android only detects a password or pattern as incorrect if it has at least 4 digits/characters or pattern dots.

Device Administrator needs to be deactivated before app uninstall.

For any questions:
mdeveloperspost@gmail.com
summary: Who touched my phone? Who unlocked? Who tried to unlock?
recentChanges:
1. New monitoring options. You can separately select the types of reports that you want to save.
2. Help (Problem solving) on the settings screen.
3. Advanced settings changes.
4. List filtering.
5. New report viewing screen.
comments: Usually these apps ask for a lot and scam you making you pay money, but this is great! Not only is it free, but it actually works. When you try to unlock your phone, it takes a picture whether the person unlocked or couldnt get into your phone. Even though sometimes the pics could be blurry, you know someone touched your phone, which is what matters, and I love how it tells you if the person unlocked it or not. So I'm happy since my sister has been getting my phone recently without consent. Thx!

Cool app but I've noticed lately it doesn't always take a photo when phone is opened, but keeps the app launch data. I even purchased the premium to upload pics to the cloud hoping that would make a difference but it still doesn't always do it. Even after going and turning off all the battery background blocks from don't kill my app, it's like a 50/50 chance. I've tried taking a break in time between unlocking, I've tried using the button to turn on the screen and the knock knock feature.

Good app . But when the app is activated and you press the menu button and close all apps then it show that the app isn't doing its work . Like in the report file it won't show any report after you have closed all app untill you lock your screen and open the phone again . Then a new report will start automatically and previous report will show all the works . It doesn't harm the report file but since it has the administration it shouldn't be this type .

Pretty dang good app. Have only had minor set backs with the reports not saving for a couple days. But once I reset the reports saved number it fixed it somehow 🤷🏼‍♀️. And I saw from a response to another comment to triple click the word settings inside the app to reach adv. settings🤯. All is well! 💯 Y'all have quite literally allowed an unbiased tipping vote in some serious situations and I couldn't be more appreciative for all your hard work and efforts!! 👌🏻❤️

I love it soon as someone unlock your phone it will take a picture and till you the Tim and the date when the person unlocked it it don't have adds really put I recommend getting this app mainly when your children or someone come in your phone I tried it on my mom and dad and then like what is this but I caught them what time and when they looked in my phone get this app if your parents think you do things bad.

I could not find any other App that was this good, and believe me I explored. After years this App knows exactly how I want to look. This App is really a good one, but having been a victim of Cyber bullying for many years, I have been experiencing a great deal of unpleasant bullying on it from one or more of my bullies, so that I have had to discontinue using it.

It's bad now! It used to be an awesome app. But I'm going to uninstall now after many years of being a raving fan. Nowadays it's ad overload, weird permission to be granted and my favorite features don't work correctly. It doesn't recognize where things belong in a human face (though manually corrected, it's still not working). How to make a great app bad? Check out this one's history. From 5 stars to no star.

I've used this app for years and love it. However basic tools that used to be free are now premium. I'm not paying for a monthly subscription. Lately try and save a photo and it doesn't let you. Says available in premium. I'll screenshot until I find a similar app that doesn't require a subscription in order to use. Disappointing changes.

I love this app it so so so cool! But I kinda wish so many things were,like,premium or whatever. And also ima kid and it kinda made me look weird or something. But still I like it and I definitely recommend this app to anyone who either isn't old enough to wear makeup like me or just wants a fun app to do makeup on yourself. Well done!

I used to love this app, but since late when we go from you cam perfect to you cam make up and add some makeup etc the pictures get quite pixel all over the face which never used to happen before. You cam perfect is okay but you cam make up makes it pixely and its not nice. Pls fix it.

title: 14 August Banner Flex Maker 2021 Pro
description:
14 August Banner Flex Maker 2021 pro App is a good app to make your flex with Independence Day Celebration Photo frames. It is a free app to make your banner or flex with pictures of your leaders like Quaid e Azam or Allama Iqbal. Main Benefit of this App is that it is a free app.
Independence Day, observed annually on 14 August, is a national holiday in Pakistan. It commemorates the day when Pakistan achieved independence and was declared a sovereign nation.

14 August Banner Flex Maker 2021 pro is for Independence Day event with your name on pics and pak flag stickers on your face to show your patriotism across the social media world to deliver your message in single flex photo. There is a lot of option in this application you can create pak flag photo frame with 14 august themes or create pak flag DP for your social media profile pictures add text in urdu with your own choice and many more stickers,pak flag banners.
Urdu Keyboard:- For Easy user interaction you can add urdu text on your pak flag photo with text color customization and text style by selecting urdu font like urdu nastaleeq.
Add text:- Add text tool with color creation, font selection and easy drag/drop tool support to adjust your text on phone screen, with text style option you can create a drop shadow and stroke for text to make it more attractive.
Pak Flag Wallpaper Collection:- Collection of Pak flag wallpapers and background with different pak flag themes where you can add text, your own image from gallery with pak flag photo frames and stickers to design it in free each and every item is free of cost, the collection contain more then 50 Pak flag Flex pictures.
Gallery and Camera:- You can also customize Pak flag flex banner by importing or loading image as an wallpaper and background image from your mobile gallery after that you can add text, stickers and quotes. Crop option is available for large and heavy images which can crop any area of pictures with user choice selection.
You Album:- Every time when user complete his/her design he/she can store/save the image in mobile storage to save it for memorable day 14 august, after that it will be loaded inside application my album or my creation screen from where you can share it and delete it easily.

In 14 August Banner Flex Maker 2021 pro App you can create 14 August banner and flex as you want
on banners and flex with amazing urdu and english keyboard and share your photo with friends.

title: Photo Collage Maker - photo editor & photo collage
description:
Just select several pictures, inCollage the best Photo Collage Maker & Photo Editor will instantly remix them into cool photo collage, photo grids or memes. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, frame, text and much more. It's completely FREE! 

Features:
● Combine up to 20 photos to create pic collages.
● 300+ Layouts of photo frames or grids to choose from!
● Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
● Pick a picture, add text and share Meme with friends.
● Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
● Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
● Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
● Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
● Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Line, etc.

📷 Photo Frames
Photo in templates is much trendy nowadays. Tons of photo frames and effects make your moment stunning, like love photo frames, anniversary, holiday & baby photo frames…

📷 Meme Generator For Free
This photo collage maker is also a meme generator and meme maker. You can create the funniest memes with more than 50 fonts to choose from, and text color and size adjustment.

📷 Grid
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

📷 Edit
All-in-one photo editor provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

📷 Freestyle
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a wscrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

📷 Multi-fit
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose Instagram’s 1:1, 4:5 ratio or other ratios to square. Easily post entire photo on Instagram with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
inCollage asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos so that we can edit photos and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

inCollage - Collage Maker & Photo Editor is the best photo collage maker, meme generator, pic stitch and photo editor for Instagram and printing. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com

comments: This is THE BEST collage maker ever!!! I've been using collage makers for YEARS! At times it has been very frustrating trying to find a perfect app, with perfect layouts, with perfect editing options, and more! It's a HUGE relief to not be bothered by intrusive ads that force you to watch them! This one has set the bar unreachably high for the other "collage maker" apps out here. Thank you so much!! As soon as I realized how convenient this was, I uninstalled other apps REAL FAST. I'm so happy!

This is a great collage app but this still needs a lot of works to improve. Like in two photo collage, I hope I can blur out or edit the other one. The filter doesn't work. Also I hope you add lines when placing a text or an object in work just like in PicsArt so that it follows a certain placement in the picture.

title: Pixomatic - Background eraser & Photo editor
description:
Want a professional-grade photo editor at your fingertips? There’s no training needed!
Explore endless options through available features of photo editing that let you: remove background and objects, create a transparent background, clip out shapes, сrop, add text and filters, merge photos, and even more. Feel like a content creator with our digital photo editor app!
 
-IMAGES CUT OUT-
Create cutouts and erase photo background with Pixomatic’s cut tool and background eraser. It’s easy! Select the cut tool, outline the item you want to erase and click apply. Save the cutout for later use, change the background, or leave background transparent.
 
-BACKGROUND OR UNWANTED OBJECT REMOVER-
Did someone photobomb your selfie? Are power lines distracting from the beauty of your landscape photo? Use Pixomatic’s object removal or background eraser to fix your images.
 
-PHOTO BLENDER-
Blend the best parts of multiple photos. By using double exposure, you can play with colors and textures, change styles, shift the mood of your pictures – and merge images. 
 
-PHOTO FILTERS-
Choose from more than 100 different filters for the look and feel you want. Old-school fans will also appreciate 35 Polarize effects.
 
-RETOUCH YOUR SELFIES-
Use Pixomatic face tools to retouch your selfies and impress your followers. Add glow to your face, erase acne, whiten your teeth, remove your blemishes, and more!
 
-ADJUST PHOTOS-
A perfectionist’s paradise: Add finishing touches to get the exact contrast, exposure, shades, and color depth that you want.
 
-SHARE TO INSTA, FB, TIKTOK, TWITTER, ETC.-
Share pictures directly to your favorite social media platforms in two clicks.
 
Be on-trend. Be different. And always be creative.

descriptionHTML:
Want a professional-grade photo editor at your fingertips? There’s no training needed!
Explore endless options through available features of photo editing that let you: remove background and objects, create a transparent background, clip out shapes, сrop, add text and filters, merge photos, and even more. Feel like a content creator with our digital photo editor app!

-IMAGES CUT OUT-
Create cutouts and erase photo background with Pixomatic’s cut tool and background eraser. It’s easy! Select the cut tool, outline the item you want to erase and click apply. Save the cutout for later use, change the background, or leave background transparent.

-BACKGROUND OR UNWANTED OBJECT REMOVER-
Did someone photobomb your selfie? Are power lines distracting from the beauty of your landscape photo? Use Pixomatic’s object removal or background eraser to fix your images.

-PHOTO BLENDER-
Blend the best parts of multiple photos. By using double exposure, you can play with colors and textures, change styles, shift the mood of your pictures – and merge images.

-PHOTO FILTERS-
Choose from more than 100 different filters for the look and feel you want. Old-school fans will also appreciate 35 Polarize effects.

-RETOUCH YOUR SELFIES-
Use Pixomatic face tools to retouch your selfies and impress your followers. Add glow to your face, erase acne, whiten your teeth, remove your blemishes, and more!

-ADJUST PHOTOS-
A perfectionist’s paradise: Add finishing touches to get the exact contrast, exposure, shades, and color depth that you want.

-SHARE TO INSTA, FB, TIKTOK, TWITTER, ETC.-
Share pictures directly to your favorite social media platforms in two clicks.

Be on-trend. Be different. And always be creative.

very cool! I have tried all different types of editing apps and this one is hands down the best so far.

title: Shutterfly Share Sites
description:
It's easy to manage your sports team, class, or group with the Shutterfly Share Sites app.
Share photos, calendar events, and communicate with all of your groups from your mobile phone!

KEY FEATURES: 
• Photos:  Upload, View, Like and Comment on pictures posted by members.
• Calendar:  Manage your site calendar. View date, time, and location of each game or event.
• Members:  Access your member list and Add new members.
• Roster/Class List:  See the list of players/students and their parents' contact info.
• Messages:  Communicate/chat with your group.

Shutterfly Share Sites are photo sharing and group collaboration websites that are free, fun, and easy to make. 

They are great for:
• Sports teams - The perfect team manager!  Post Game and Practice Schedules
• Family and Friends - Share photos and stay in touch
• Classrooms - View class events and pictures
• Travel - Upload photos and take your loved ones along your journey
• Life Events - Cherish your precious memories:  Weddings, Baby, Celebrations
• Groups and Clubs - Coordinate and collaborate on activities

comments: Still too difficult for some users to understand how to view and post to the family site we created thru Shutterfly. Just now I tried to check on pending members through my phone app. It locked up. Back on my computer three family have said they've "joined" but they show as "pending". Why?? If I as owner need to "accept" them, how does the owner do this? I've looked everywhere and can only invite, which I've done. Frustrating. (Update) to answer the develooer, it's mostly when people use the app
The video function does not appear even after uninstall/reinstall.

Not like the first app I downloaded. The first one looks like a real website, the 2nd one doesn't have some of the most important tabs. I was going to attach a picture of the 2 different versions, but I'm not sure how to do that. Many of our site users who have the 2nd version are very unhappy with it.
Update did correct the video functionality. Thank you! This is much appreciated. Still does not allow access to all content, i.e., can not access .pdf files.
I can't update the calendar. I updated it on my PC and the dates don't show when I return to the app. Too bad

comments: One of my fav apps that I've used for a long time & loved it. Sorry I updated it cos now it truly sucks! Wow after you apply txt it is moved from where it was originally placed ruining the image. APRIL 2, 2021: This app just gets crappier & crappier. You should truly remove the horrible changes you made when updating & revert back to your original awesome app! Update July 2021: Blows more & more & why don't you fix it so letters don't move from where you placed them after you finish editing!

Never works right. Don't waste your time. Used the app for years and now you have to edit something multiple times to get it to actually save in your phone. Plus the changes dissappear when you click save in the application itself. Way too glitch. They don't invest any money in updates and I'm done using it.

It is very difficult and compicated to explain my frustration. It looked like it would work splendidly, but that isn't the case. When i try importing pictures to edit it says *edit failed* which makes no sense because the files aren't too large nor to small. I really wish I could boost my rating, but the amount of times I have tried to fix it and it none of my problems have ceased. It all is just very nerve wracking and stressful, if you an look into it and fix it up that would be great! -Sophia

I like this app. I wish it had a range of fonts for my android phone though. It only has one which I find clumsy. I prefer the Script font which I can access on my IPad. Other than that it's a fab app which I have used for years.

Used to love this app, making colourful collages and editing photos easily but I reinstalled it on a new phone and now I can't download any of the free overlays or frames. The download button just says "retry" every time I click it. Been happening for a few weeks.

title: Green Pak Flag Flex maker – 14 august
description:
Green Pak flag flex maker for 14 august Independence Day event with your name on pics and pak flag stickers on your face to show your patriotism across the social media world to deliver your message in single flex photo. There is a lot of option in this application you can create pak flag photo frame with 14 august themes or create pak flag DP for your social media profile pictures add text in urdu with your own choice and many more stickers like pak army stickers, Pak flag shirts, pak flag on face stickers, pak flag banners with quotes and Jashn e Azadi quotes.
Urdu Keyboard:- For Easy user interaction you can add urdu text on your pak flag photo with text color customization and text style by selecting urdu font like urdu nastaleeq.
Add text:- Add text tool with color creation, font selection and easy drag/drop tool support to adjust your text on phone screen, delete and change text style option support in a single touch with text style option you can create a drop shadow and stroke for text to make it more attractive.
Pak Flag Wallpaper Collection:- Collection of Pak flag wallpapers and background with different pak flag themes where you can add text, your own image from gallery with pak flag photo frames and stickers to design it in free each and every item is free of cost, the collection contain more then 50 Pak flag Flex pictures.
Gallery and Camera:- You can also customize Pak flag flex banner by importing or loading image as an wallpaper and background image from your mobile gallery after that you can add text, stickers and quotes. Crop option is available for large and heavy images which can crop any area of pictures with user choice selection.
You Album:- Every time when user complete his/her design he/she can store/save the image in mobile storage to save it for memorable day 14 august, after that it will be loaded inside application my album or my creation screen from where you can share it and delete it easily.
Note:- Photographs used for the icon and screenshots and background resources are under Creative Commons License.

title: PicLab - Photo Editor
description:
PicLab, also known as Photo Editor, is one of the most powerful design studios that fits in the palm of your hands. With over 20 million installs, PicLab is the premier all-in-one editor to fulfill all of your photo editing needs. If you're looking for an easy way to create unique looking pictures and convey a unique message, this is the way to do it! 

Easily edit photos of any kind - selfies, food, architecture, scenery, and fashion. Add beautiful typography & artwork, apply stunning filters and photo effects, and add an ever-growing collection of shapes, light FX, textures, borders, patterns, and more to your photos and share them to your favorite social networks. With the PicLab app, you will have access to the perfect photo editor for Instagram and for creating beautiful and unique pictures right at your fingertips.

The app was designed with usability in mind. Making it fun and effortless to edit your pictures is our goal!

PicLab Photo Editing Features 📸

Typography 🖋
⭑ Choose from a collection of stunning text fonts to add to your photos, made by some of the world’s best designers.
⭑ Easily resize, rotate, and adjust text opacity.
⭑ Multiple text layers to create beautiful typography.
⭑ Add drop-shadows to your text

Stickers & Artwork 🎨
⭑ Choose from a delightful collection of stickers, overlays & artwork to add onto your photos. Expressing yourself has never been more fun!

Photo Filters 🌅
⭑ Apply one of our 20 gorgeous photo filters - with more on the way!

Photo Effects 🎞
⭑ Adjust the brightness, saturation, contrast, blur, and exposure of your photos.

Image Overlays and Masks 🎭
⭑ Impress your friends by applying a collection of hundreds (and growing) of shapes, borders, overlays, textures, light leaks, and gradients to add that extra flair to your photos. 

Drawing Tool ✍️
⭑ Perfect for those who want to draw some rough notes, instructions, captions & more on their photos. 

Collage Tool 🖼
⭑ Choose from our great selection of unique and fun collages.

Crop Photos 📐
⭑ Easily crop photos using our preset ratios or drag cropping tool to your desired width and height. 

This free photo editing app allows you to create unlimited fun, quirky, or professional photo edits on your phone. Upload, edit, and share as many photos as you want, whenever you want. No previous design experience or knowledge is needed to use our photo editing app.  

PicLab Pro Premium Features 💫

⭐️ Unlock all filters
⭐️ Discover 65+ premium overlays
⭐️ Access 60 premium fonts
⭐️ Add 25+ sticker packs with over 1,000 stickers options
⭐️ Instant access to new photo editing features
⭐️ Remove watermark
⭐️ Ad-free experience

Download. Create. Share. 
We can't wait to see your creativity in action with PicLab! Use the hashtag #PicLab if you'd like to share your photos with the community! 

Follow us:
Instagram @PicLab
Twitter @PicLab

Happy Photo Editing, 
The PicLab Team

title: Tactacam WiFi
description:
You can connect the Tactacam 4.0 to your Android device with the app, after establishing the connection, you can see live what your camera sees, start or stop recording, view your videos, and download videos to your device for sharing.

How to Connect:
1.Turn on your Tactacam’s WiFi
2.Connect to the camera WiFi, on your device
3.Open the Tactacam App


Features:
1.Watch the live stream from camera
2.Start and stop recording
3.Change modes for different video quality and frame rates
4.Change white balance for
5.Format your Tactacam SD card 
6.View, Download or delete videos
7.Automatically sets time and date with iPhone or iPad when connected
8.Supports most Android Devices
9.Supports full video playback with audio before downloading
10.Upside down function available
11.Slow motion function available

comments: App seems to run fine with the one camera that I have. But currently unable to add another camera (should be able to have 3). Reached out to Tactacam about issue. And was told it'll be escalate to engineering to help resolve. Will change rating pending issue being solved.
Seems to work on and off with my one camera. And perfectly fine with another.

I bought the Tactacam FTS package and it works well for recording through my scope. The app unfortunately freezes every time I try to do anything other than look at the live video feed. I contacted the mfr. and was instructed to click "Forget" on the Tactacam network and then reconnect. It worked only once and then reverted to the same freeze-up behavior. I tried it on 2 different model LG phones, and both freeze. I like the product itself, but without the app working I am not able to access the full capabilities.

camera itself works great, I cannot share vids at all. I contacted customer service and after about 2 weeks of back and forth, they decided it was a problem with my phone. they advised me to contact samsung and ask them to change the operating system to function properly with the app. really? I also tried on iphone, and ipad without success. seems as though they are unwilling to fix the app to work with all operating systems. bad customer service.

Mine did work fine last year. Now it will not let me share videos. Say app keeps stopping. Looked into details and says crash. Cameras work absolutely great. But now I can't share. So basically useless. Hope tactacam gets app fixed. Tactacam fixed my issue immediately. The customer service is by far the best in the industry bar none. My rating is now 5 stars! These are fine people to deal with and the product is by far the best I've used.

title: Photo Collage Maker - Photo Collage & Grid
description:
Photo Collage Maker is a must-have pic collage maker and photo editor app. 
Photo Collage Maker helps you create stunning collage artwork with 500+ layouts, filters, adjust, stickers, text, frame, poster etc.
Photo Collage Maker is the best photo collage tool to customize your scrapbook with exclusive neon collection, IG story templates, graffiti, photo on photo… 

Create and share your precious moments on Instagram, IG story, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, LINE with Photo Collage Maker. 100% FREE & FANTASTIC!

Features:
● Mix up to 18 photos to make a nice photo collage
● 100+ Layouts with adjustable border, ratio and background
● 500+ Filters, effects, stickers, fonts and graffiti to pick up
● Scrapbook & posters to create photo collage in your own style
● Photo on photo option to make a unique pics art
● Adjusting tools, such as brightness, contrast, exposure, tint, etc.
● Add text to photos to make MEME quickly
● No crop needed, blur option with 1:1, 9:16 ratios for Instagram and all media
● Save photos in high resolution or share them to Facebook, WhatsApp, Line, Instagram, VK, etc.
 
Coming soon:
+ Video editor supported, including cut, speed, add music, etc.
+ Collage video and photos.
 
 
🌟 Photo Collage Maker 
Create an instant photo collage in seconds with a variety of grids and poster templates to choose from. And you can also adjust frames, edit border of collage, change background color as you like in this powerful photo collage maker.
 
✨ Photo Editor Pro
Plenty of stylish filters for pictures and effects to meet all your photo editing needs, such as Sketch, Retro, Cyberpunk, Foodie, Duo tone… and you can also find stunning photo effects like VHS & vaporwave. Adjusting brightness, contrast, warmth, shadows, sharpness and exposure to enhance pictures is also available in this professional photo editor.
 
About permissions:
1. To create and save photos, Photo Collage Maker needs the “Storage” permission to access photos and files on your device.
2. To capture beautiful photos, Photo Collage Maker needs the “Camera” permission to take pictures.
 
Thanks for creating your photo memory with Photo Collage Maker, the best photo collage app and photo editor. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know at photocollagemaker.feedback@gmail.com.

comments: In a sentence I can say it's completely perfect & the best camera app for men. However it could be better if they integrate English translation into the app.
I use custom ROM. Does it support Root. This thing is not opening. It is frozen like ice.

This would be a 5-star app if it had its English translation done, but alas, it hasn't. I reinstall every cpl months to see if its been translated yet, but unless i happen to be in the mood for a lot of tedious trial-and-error shooting, I'll usually just uninstall again til the next time I remember to check. Like I'm gonna do ... now.

I could really like this apps quality of adjustment tools and other interesting features if it were in English. Japanese characters are amazing to ponder to my Greek alphabet eyes and I wish I could gain literacy in it but until I do I'm probably going to stick with apps I can use apps that are in my primary language.

This app is amazing. The only catch is that it takes a bit to find your way around if you can only read English. But once you know where everything is, it's so useful. Aside from needing a better translation, it's got everything you'd want from a selfie camera app

Photolift Face & Body Editor enables you editing your face and body shape, create your own style easily by trying on trendy hair and beard styles, tattoos, eyeglasses, hats and many more accessories🕴️‍💖

Besides, Photolift Face & Body Editor is a magical photo editing tool to reshape your body without having to exercise 💪 You can make your body look perfect and your waist look slimmer, remove your belly fat and reshape your body curves 💃

It is so easy to create your dream appearance and look sexy in seconds with Photolift Face & Body Editor which offers simple and enjoyable user interface, and with its continuously renewed and developed face and body sticker 🔍

Photolift Face & Body Editor is an excellent tool for editing your photos for your Instagram, Facebook profile or posts for many other social media platforms 📸

Some excellent features of the Photolift Face & Body Editor application:
 - Ability to have realistic muscles with a few touches 💪
 - Various hair and beard styles to apply 💇‍♀️ 💇‍♂️
 - Numerous accessories, hats, glasses, neck wears and many more to try on 👒

 - Professional photo filters, and adjustment options to polish your photos 🌃
 - High resolution output
 - Various options to save and share your work… 🙌

Now start recreating yourself or anybody you like! 💥

About In-App Purchases and Subscriptions

We offer both a 7 days free trial period and in-app purchases that may require a specific charge to access additional features within.

Monthly Package: Current subscription price is $12.99 /month. Our Monthly Package offers a 7 days free trial period, within this period you can cancel at any time without commitment. However, Subscriptions will automatically be renewed every month if you decide not to cancel your plan and continue to enjoy our Premium features. (Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice.)

Free Version: Allows limited usage.

Trial Version: With the free trial version of the Photolift app, you can have unlimited access to all the features of the app. After the end of the trial period, the package fee will be charged, and you will be upgraded to the paid version. 

Paid Version (Premium Version): You can purchase a subscription package and upgrade to the paid version of Photolift at any time. In our paid subscription, you can have unlimited access to all the features of the app without any ads.

When you purchase a subscription package, the fee is charged to your Google Play account and it will vary from country to country.
You will be clearly disclosed the subscription fee amount before completing the purchase.
To terminate automatic subscription renewal, you must deselect the automatic subscription renewal option 24 hours before your subscription expires
You can cancel automatic renewal from your Google Play account settings at any time you want
https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

comments: Awesome 👍 love this piece of software. Fun to use - love the ease of getting around the amazing array of filters. No problem in recommending this to anyone with a camera. Btw, this is a review for the freebie - I am looking forward to purchasing the pro version. 🥇First rate!

Loud ads This works fine. The ads are a bit intrusive at times. A recent update allows ads to play out loud while you are trying to use the app. At some point the advertisements are the dominating force over the app itself and... it just feels backwards. You are downloading an ad which has some functionality as an app.

Really easy to use and the effects add a lot to pictures. If they didn't have an ad every time you looked at a new picture it would be great. I'll probably end up switching to another app because of that period I wanted to use this for a project to give my daughter pictures of her year But it takes forever with the ads
Great app if your willing to spend more time watching ads than actually using it! I think I'm going to have to delete it. Shame, but I'm not going to be forced to watch this amount of ads by anyone.

As I learned digital art this has become an incredible tool in my tool belt. It's also fun. Especially fun for kids. And even their Gandmother's. I want to thank all the hard-working team who helped create this app. This is the second time you've improved it. Congratulations!

title: Gallery EZ
description:
EZ Gallery is a gallery app that emphasizes speed and simplicity. Using technology created for our professional photo management app, F-Stop Gallery, EZ Gallery provides blazing fast load times, one-handed operation and intuitive gestures that make it the only app you need for everyday use.

/// KEY FEATURES
• Dark and light themes with customization
• Explorer view that allows you to navigate your media using the folder structure
• Clean interface with many sort and view options
• Two-finger image rotate
• Show or hide hidden folders and protect with a pin, pattern or fingerprint
• Prevent accidental image loss by requiring a pin, pattern or fingerprint to delete a photo
• Quickly share with and/or edit your photos
• Tap on the left or right side of the screen to navigate image viewing
• Change the thumbnail size for folders and images using the pinch-to-zoom gesture
• Quickly exit to the thumbnail view by swiping down on the image
• Convenient slideshow mode
• Support for many different image and video formats including GIF, JPG, PNG, MP4, MKV, and more.

comments: Amazing gallery app. Probably the best one out there if your ROM does not come with a full feature gallery. A few problems: 1.) Recent update broke the security feature. You are not able to input a new PIN so you will not be able to hide folders if you remove it or reset the app, or coming from a fresh install than an update 2.) It grabs the first frame of a video rather than a random frame and makes that the thumbnail. So any video that starts with a fade will have a black thumbnail.
Great simple viewer. Needs one thing though. Could you please add a "fill screen" option under "media viewer" just like you have an f-stop. Thank you very much.

title: PixelLab - Text on pictures
description:
Adding stylish text, 3d text, shapes, stickers and drawing on top of your picture has never been easier.  With a simple and clean interface that lets you focus on whatever you're doing, a wide selection of presets, fonts, stickers, backgrounds, more than 60 unique options that you can customize and of course your imagination, you'll be able to create stunning graphics and amaze your friends straight from your phone or tablet.

If you want to see the app in action, here is a YouTube playlist that contains some tutorials : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLj6ns9dBMhBL3jmB27sNEd5nTpDkWoEET


Features:
Text: add and customize as much text objects as you want…
3D Text: create 3d texts and overlay them on top of your images, or have them stand on their own in a cool poster…
Text effects: make your text stand out with dozens of text effects like : Shadow, Inner Shadow, Stroke, Background, Reflection, Emboss, Mask, 3d text...
Text color: Set your text to any fill option you want, be it a simple color, a linear gradient, a radial gradient, or an image texture.
Text font: choose from 100+, hand picked fonts. Or use your own fonts !
Stickers: add and customize as much stickers, emojis, shapes, as you want...
Import images: add your own images from gallery. This could come in handy when you have your own stickers, or you want to composite two images...
Draw: pick a pen size, a color, then draw anything you want. after that the drawing acts like a shape and you can resize it, rotate it, add shadow to it...
change the background: with the possibility of making it : a color, a gradient or an image.
Save as a project: you can save anything you do as a project. It'll be available for use even after closing the app!
Remove the background: be it a green screen, a blue screen or simply a white background behind an object in an image that you found on Google images; PixelLab can make it transparent for you.
Edit image perspective: you can now perform perspective editing (warp). Handy for, replacing a monitor's content, changing a road sign's text, adding logos on boxes...
Image effects: enhance your pictures' look by applying some of the available effects, which include vignette, stripes, hue, saturation...
Export your Image: save or share at any format or resolution you want, For easy access you can use the Quick Share buttons to share the image to social media apps with a click of a button (ex : facebook,twitter, instagram...)
Create memes: using the provided meme preset, you can easily have your memes ready for sharing in matter seconds.
Browse quotes and insert anything you like, into what you're making !


If you have a suggestion, a question or  you want to report a bug please use the provided feedback function or contact me directly via emails...

recentChanges: Bug fixes, improvements.
comments: Not only it has many backgrounds,3D options,shadow/reflection options,colors and fonts but it also doesn't have a watermark and it is also super easy to use this has helped me so much with my youtube channel thanks to the creators. Also it lacks two very important features: adding blur to an image and mirroring the image. I hope you add these 2 features it would be awesome

I've been using this app for a long time and it really has all what you need. Lately something went wrong with the emboss, stroke and the 3D text. They are not working properly and the text looks scratched when using any of them. I've read some other reviews about these problems lately. Also sometimes although the text looks OK, it appears scratched when saved in ultra quality.

Free to do whatever I want. It is really a decent and well created editing tool, moreover tools does not even required any payment, watching ADS, and subscription, all things are free. Although, I lost my touch sometimes, most of time actually. Sure, it is a lot of tools and sometimes it can get really messy and all over the place, and sometimes it could not even save my progress, project automatically.

Does this ever get updated? The 3d feature is frankly, awesome. I'm dismayed that despite using the remove colour tool with a tolerance at 28, then saving the image as high quality, its helpfully left a white border around the image. No need. Just remove the white. When I select remove colour, I do not expect that colour to remain. A gif making tool would be useful also. As would any form of instruction on the bewildering curve feature. Hey and how about just ANY updates, ever?

This is the most basic and advanced editing app, it has pretty much everything for free But the sad thing is that it looks like the development team for this app is pretty much dead as no Major updates and features have been added in many years since the app was released which means the app is still in it's pretty much early version of the release, with only some minor changes so don't expect any more major updates or features to be added. This could've been the photoshop of android.

title: Rumble Camera - Make Money With Your Videos
description:
Rumble Camera allows you to make money with videos that you film with your phones camera. In today's world, video creators are being taken advantage of; social media platforms don't pay what you deserve, you lack visibility, transparency, and there are no good tools that allow you to control distribution. Rumble's camera app does all this for you.

FEATURES on our camera app:
- Film your videos from the Rumble camera app
- Upload, store and host your videos for free (in Rumble's cloud storage).
- Get full transparency and control on where your video is being distributed and how its monetized.
- Make money on videos you thought you never had any value.
- Sync all videos from your phone to the Rumble Camera app.
- Ability to cash out straight from the camera app.

FEATURES on web (accessible on Rumble.com):
- Full data analytics. See exactly what websites used your videos and how much you made.
- White-lists & Blacklists. You can stop any website at anytime from using your content.
- Ability to create as many channels as you like.
- Ability to subscribe to channels.

Rumble's camera will strive to be the place where you earn the maximum amount of money for the videos you create. The Rumble Camera app is free and works on most devices.

title: Add Text On Photo - Photo Text Editor
description:
☀️In the world overflowed with visual content it is hard to grab the attention of the seen-it-all viewer. Fortunately, a witty phrase or an inspirational quote can do the trick. Intertwining the art of word and the art of imagery has proven to be quite effective in making your works stand out. It’s not difficult with Add Text On Photo - Photo Text Editor.
💖Features for Valentine’s Day:
● Quickly to add texts on photos, easy to create love photos, memes, photo captions or creative typography design.
● More than 100+ free fonts and font design, multiple text, font size, opacity, color, position, perspective (transform angles), rotation, bold, italic, capitalize, centrations, line spacing and letter spacing, wrap text, shadow, stroke (outline), glow (highlight), flip, mirror. Now you can create thousands of beautiful typography designs for yourself by inserting text on photos.
● Professional text editor toolkit to edit text on photos: filter, crop, effect, brightness, contrast, saturation, colorize, blur, sharpen, transparency and so on.
● Add location and time in your text photos with many themes.
● Creating your own signature is easier than ever.
● Customize edit text: size, color, shadow, effect, decoration, stroke, border are available to edit text to photo for Valentine’s Day.
● Beautiful hearts stickers in various galleries to make your love photos more glorious.
● Variety background in many categories: hearts photos, love photos, photos of flowers and a lot of free photos for you to choose to add text on photos.
● Save your text images in high resolution and easy to share it to friends or in social networks.
💖 If you are looking for a simple way to add text to photos, words on pictures or you love reading love quotes on social networks and want to add quotes to photos, download our Add Text On Photo - Photo Text Editor app. All in one application, you are holding in hand the best insert text in photos for Valentine’s Day!
🌻Add Text On Photo - Photo Text Editor is still in the development period, so we always listen to your feedback, we highly appreciate your rate and comment to improve and make photo text editing better.
🍀 If you have any feedback or suggestions, please write to vancanhgarim@gmail.com . We would love to hear from you! Sincerely, thank you!

developerAddress: 606 - Margin Garden 2 - TM, Hoang Mai, Ha Noi
recentChanges:
In this version:
+ Fix crash app
comments: Great app but... Unfortunately the advertising is horrible and takes up much of the screen in most of the menu pages. I wouldn't mind paying for an app such as this except the monthly subscription amount they are charging I wouldn't even pay to buy outright! It's more than a MS Office subscription! More reasonable pricing (like a one off or yearly payment of $5) would be sure to result in a better yeild for the developers. Aside from these gripes, It's quite a good app.
This app shows 100 ads for creating just one post. There are so many better apps out there. Absolutely unusable app due to amount of ads. Don't install it. You will get frustrated.
Super fun and easy to use! There is an option to buy fonts, but there are some free ones as well! I absolutely love this app!
great app! i love customized wallpaper with song lyrics and this app was perfect for it! not many fonts, but the ones that are there are amazing

This app was very good. Simple to use and great options for text editing. But, recently they started overdoing the ads. I can't change the font without an ad. I can't change color, size, style, edit a part of the text without ads. In the middle of editing. I used to be able to edit in a minute or two without ads, now it took me more than ten minutes to do so with every action I tried to do resulting in an ad. Deleting from my phone for sure.

title: Skylight
description:
The Skylight app allows you to manage your Skylight devices.

If you have a Skylight Frame, you can send photos and videos to your Frame from anywhere! Simply log in and connect to your frame to start sending photos in seconds.

If you have a Skylight Calendar, you can review, add, and remove items from your Grocery List.

Features include:
- Video. Send and play videos on your Skylight Frame.
- Text captions. Add text captions to photos.
- Download. View and download all the photos from your Skylight onto your phone.
- Manage frames. Easily manage all your Skylight Frames in one app.
- Cloud backup. All your photos backed up forever.
descriptionHTML:
The Skylight app allows you to manage your Skylight devices.

If you have a Skylight Frame, you can send photos and videos to your Frame from anywhere! Simply log in and connect to your frame to start sending photos in seconds.

If you have a Skylight Calendar, you can review, add, and remove items from your Grocery List.

Features include:
- Video. Send and play videos on your Skylight Frame.
- Text captions. Add text captions to photos.
- Download. View and download all the photos from your Skylight onto your phone.
- Manage frames. Easily manage all your Skylight Frames in one app.
- Cloud backup. All your photos backed up forever.
summary: Manage your Skylight Frame and Skylight Calendar on the go!
recentChanges: New feature: remote settings
comments: Pretty easy to use but the subscription pop ups are so aggressive that it genuinely makes it more difficult to navigate the app. If I could redo it, I'd buy a product that is more expensive upfront but doesn't have a pay wall for every tiny thing (see photos that have already been uploaded, make albums, etc). Note - that means that if you accidentally upload the wrong photo, you may not be able to retrieve it 🙃 buyer beware

I was excited to get the frame. Setting up was difficult because I didn't understand why the calendar was already full, was it an example? Then other peoples photos showed up after I paid for subscription. How do they come off? Now the app has charged me twice. Frustrated 😒

I got the frame for my parents last Christmas so I could send them pictures of their grandbaby, and they love it! I love how easy it is to send photos -- there are a few different ways to send them. Also, huge bonus that I was able to quickly and easily set it up for them remotely, as they are verrrrrrry bad at tech. Also love that my sister can send photos of her family too. This is one of the best gifts I've ever given them. Such a great gift if you're far away from your family.

Mostly easy to use. Addictive. Nice connection with others app doesn't add photos from our second phone but we probably just need to change the permissions. When our second phone owner was invited to use the app vs emailing, clearer instructions would be nice.

Terrible app. Loads correctly about 20% of the time on a brand new Samsung s21. Awful notification control. The picture frame is OK, with only fair resolution. A good idea with meh execution. Oh, and the website they tell you to use to activate it gives you a 404 error.

title: HD Camera for Android
description:
This is an native android system camera app. HD Camera utilized all advantage of your phone or tablet. Let you snaps quick and easy photos and videos.

Key features:
- camera and video features
- 3 modes: camera, video recorder & panorama
- Pinch to zoom
- smart panorama shooting 
- Countdown Timer
- Dynamic user interface (phone/tablet)
- Wide screen pictures
- Picture quality setting
- White balance settings(Incandescent, Fluorescent, Auto, Daylight,Cloudy)
- Screen mode settings(Action, Night, Sunset, Play)
- Exposure
- Location targeting
- Configurable volume keys
- Photo Callage 
- Photo crop and photo editing.

Although in the current market, there are have many kinds of camera applications, but we still think this android native application is the most efficient and able to meet a user needs. Here only as a supplement for those devices are not installed android native system provides an additional option. 

Notes:
The special permissions for use
1, android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
HD Camera can remember your photos and videos location if you wish. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.

2, android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
After you take a photo,  you can share with others. HD Camera need to read the contacts information and help you share photos via email, SMS, or other apps.

------------------
Disclaimer：
This app is based on native android camera code, and licensed under the Apache License.
code: https://github.com/CyanogenMod/android_packages_apps_Camera2
Apache Licens: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

title: Secret Shoot-Background Camera Record
description:
Secret Shoot – an app camera that helps in recording video in the background mode with the option of camera preview. with many functions useful as continuous recording in background when screen off the background video recorder app offers to schedule to recording. the quick video recorder is a camera application that assists in recording video by one click with options to camera preview as well as enable/disable camera shutter sounds. the scheduled recording offers to set duration for the background video recording. one click video recorder to record video in background anytime. and not just record video in the background, you can also click snaps with screen off.

FEATURES:
+ trim videos after recording
+ enable/disable preview view
+ record videos in background
+ widget to select to record video on back camera or front camera
+ background motion detection and click snap on detecting motion of mobile phone
+ press Volume Buttons to take snaps after activating Snapshots mode
+ one-tap start/stop recording video
+ unlimited number of video recordings
+ unlimited video duration
+ video trimming and sharing
+ use it as Dash Cam
+ set easy duration for each video record
+ schedule mobile camera to record video for specific time
+ dash camera mode
+ auto stop recording when low storage on device
+ interactive GUI design

note:
Secret Shoot run services for each feature i.e. capturing video, clicking snaps, motion detection and schedule recording video. all of these services requires to use camera. In order to recorder app to work properly one service will run at a time i.e. one feature will run at a time.

Convenient editing tools: easily change color, remove unnecessary elements, adjust transparency, brightness, contrast and add noise. Realistic tattoo overlay on uneven body surfaces. Large updated catalog of tattoos.

LARGE COLLECTION OF TATTOOS
Classic & Traditional - Graphic - Lettering - Oriental - Tribal - Old & new school - Outline - Geometric - Watercolor - Anime and much more.

TEXT TATTOOS - more than 50 tattoo fonts.

YOUR OWN SKETCHES - turn your designs into tattoos!

REALISTIC OVERLAY TATTOOS ON uneven body surfaces.

We are open to ideas and feedback and will be happy to chat on Instagram: Tattoo.cs

title: Glitch Lab
description:
Glitch Lab brings well known effects as well as novel ideas to the world of digital glitch art, following the philosophy of simplicity, power and control of its predecessor apps.

Effects are organized into categories and span a wide array in and around the concept of glitch art. 

Glitch Lab is simple to use yet at the same time endlessly configurable. Filters combine to produce endless variations of your art.

Effects
Over 100 effects covering:
★ Color
★ Streaking, Breaking, Repeating, Data corruption
★ Pixel Sorting
★ Retro (Pixelation, Scanlines etc.)
★ 3D (sphere, voxel, smooth surfaces and more)
★ Text and gimmicks
★ Art filters

Powerful user interface
★ Infinite undo/redo
★ Erase parts of the last applied effect (PRO)
★ Bookmark images to save progress or reuse as masks
★ Area of effect options (activate from settings)

Video
Glitch Lab comes with a powerful animation module. Create smooth videos with parameter interpolation between key frames (be sure to activate video from the app settings).

PRO Version
Available as an in-app purchase, the PRO version comes with extra filters, extra parameters, higher resolutions and lossless file saving (PNG).

This app is great, even without the premium you get so many filters. I've edited so many art works in this, just like my profile

I purchased the pro version of this app and lost access to my email and account for the app when I ordered a new phone so oter than that I'd enjoy using the apps to edit different images ... I would like to be able to unlock the pro version again without needing to repurchase it.

title: PhotoStudio - Photo Editor Pro
descriptionHTML:
Photo Studio offers everything that you need to edit your pictures like never before. Simple and easy app with high quality filters, picture resize, crop, overlays, Adjustments, Structures, Fit, text and detailed editing. With Photo Studio you can post your artworks to Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram etc., and impress your friends etc.
The best all-in-one free Application with creative tool to enhance, stylise, and animate your images. We offer every tool in this app to polish your pictures to give a professional look.

⭐FREE PHOTO EDITOR:

Instantly make your pictures look better with this filters. Enhance your image with editing tools including contrast, exposure, saturation, and clarity. Resize the photo to fit any social network like Instagram, TikTok, snapchat, Facebook etc.;

⭐SIMPLE AND EASY STUDIO EDITOR:

Photo Studio is an amazing studio editing software you will ever need on your Android phone.

This is specially designed for average user in mind, simple and fun to use. Everyone one can master Photo Studio Pro within minutes of first use. No image editing experiences needed.

⭐ OVERLAYS:
A simplest and easiest way to blend two pictures together with advance editing and enhancement options. Creating double or multi exposure images by blending or mixing photos.

⭐ PHOTO STICKERS:
Apply funny and beautiful stickers. Variety of sticker category available.

⭐ Resize Pictures:

Now you can fit your photos and resize for any social media platform.

⭐ PHOTO BORDERS:
With over 100+ picture borders to frame any picture perfectly into any format. As the creators of borders and frames for Instagram we have everything you need.

⭐ ADD TEXT TO PHOTO:
Over 10+ unique fonts to add the perfect message on your images. Choose any font, color, alignment, and border to put the perfect text on photo.

⭐⭐⭐ MAIN FEATURES:

+ Powerful and easy photo editing tools;
+ Apply beautiful effects and filters to polish your photos;
+ Creative Overlays available to give lightning effects;
+ Adjust brightness, contrast, warmth and saturation etc;
+ Massive fun stickers;
+ Crop photo to any size;
+ Exposure, Contrast, Highlights, Shadows, Light, Saturation, Temperature, Tint;
+ Resize photo for any Social platform;
+ Crop, rotate, vertical and horizon;
+ Adjust colorfulness, Sharpen, Grain, Denoise, Blacks, Whites, Ambience, Haze, Vignette etc;
+ Fit and border your photos for social platform;
+ Creative Stickers;
+ Create your own text with different fonts, style, quotes etc;
+ Share pictures of high resolution to Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, etc.
It is the simplest but the most useful photo effects editor offered by Vyro.ai. If you have any suggestions or concerns, feel free to let us know. Email: contact@vyro.ai

Improved app stability
Bug fixes

title: Photo Editor
description:
If you have some knowledge of photography, you can do a lot with Photo Editor.
Now use Photo Editor to edit photos on your mobile phone just like you would on a PC.

Features
* Color : exposure, brightness, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint and hue
* Curves & Levels : fine-tuning of colors
* Effects : gamma correction, auto contrast, auto tone, vibrance, blur, sharpen, oil paint, sketch, black & white high contrast, sepia, and more
* Adding text, images or shapes
* Frame, Denoise, Drawing, Pixel, Clone, Cut Out
* Rotation, Straighten, Crop, Resize
* Corrections : perspective, lens, red-eye, white balance and backlight
* Easily edit with the touch and pinch-to-zoom interface
* Save images in JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP and PDF
* View, edit, or delete Metadata (EXIF, IPTC, XMP)
* Save your final result to your gallery, as wallpaper, or on your SD card
* Share photos with e-mail, SNS and more
* Batch, Crop(Puzzle), Compress to ZIP, Create PDF, Animated GIF
* Webpage Capture, Video Capture, PDF Capture(Lollipop+)
* Ad-free option is available (Settings > Purchase Items)

*** Links
Website: https://www.iudesk.com
Tutorials: https://www.iudesk.com/photoeditor/tutorial

*** PHOTO EDITOR IS NOT SPYWARE/VIRUS!!!
Photo Editor does not contain virus or malicious code.
https://www.iudesk.com/photoeditor/security

title: HD Camera - Quick Snap Photo & Video
description:
HD Camera - Quick Snap Photo & Video is a modern, popular and smart camera app. Its high definition performance has determined it is a perfect camera for android device users. Providing more practical functions and a clearer interface, you can use this free HD camera to take more professional photos and videos with the pro mode, beauty mode, and filters. 

HD Camera - Quick Snap Photo & Video is designed as a user-friendly camera app. It helps you better shoot beautiful photos and videos. Easier and quicker.
 
With HD Camera - Quick Snap Photo & Video, you are allowed to:
- Take photos and videos with the professional mode to adjust the scene such as night, sports, party, sunset, as well as white balance
- Take photos in high definition
- Take a picture while shooting a video
- Take flawless selfies with the beauty camera 
- Beautify your photos with various filters
- HDR
- Adjust exposure when the scene is dark
- Turn on/off flash
- Adjust the ratio of the screen
- Set timer for a countdown
- Show grids for better composition
- Turn on/off shooting sound
- Touch the screen to shoot
- Dozens of filters provided, such as beauty, vintage, bleach, blue...
- Set photo and video size for the rear camera and front camera
- Save location information
- Control shooting with volume key
- View photos immediately after taking photos 
- Select the path to save photos and videos
 
More easy and useful functions are included in this free HD camera app. Try this professional HD camera for taking more beautiful and professional photos and videos. Hope you will like it.
