title: Snapfish - Print Photo, Cards, Books, Canvas, Mugs
description:
Sign up now. Get 100 free 4x6 prints every month, upload your photos & make custom photo books, personalized cards + invites on the go! 

Conveniently order prints for photo albums & create personalized photo gifts directly from your mobile device. Ordering for home delivery is fast and easy. 
With the Snapfish app you can upload your pictures & access your baby, travel, pet, wedding, birthday, graduation, vacation, snapchat photo albums from your phone or social media (works with Facebook, Instagram, iCloud, Google Photos & your Camera Roll) anywhere, anytime & claim your 100 freeprint allowance every month!
 
Perks of the Snapfish App:
• Get 100 4x6 print allocation every month (just pay shipping)! 100 Prints offer valid on US app only, see: promo.snapfish.com/free-prints for full details. 100 print allowance resets each month
• App-specific deals on products
• Quickly find your photos with album or timeline view
• Choose from a variety of collage layouts for photobooks & canvas prints, or design your own
• Make in minutes—photo books, acrylic desk accessories & photo blocks, glass prints & more!
• Variety of print sizes, from wallet size to 20x30: order 4x5.3 prints–the perfect size to order for mobile phone photos without cropping, or try our square prints–ideal for Instagram photos
• Improved prints builder lets you zoom & pan in the crop area, edit quantity & size of each print & choose a paper finish for entire order (glossy or matte)
• Combined print size orders
• Quick turnaround! Have your photo prints mailed, or pick up in-store at CVS, Walgreens, and Walmart within an hour if you need your images fast
• Easy Payment options: ApplePay, PayPal, Bank or Credit Card

New Products!
Find the perfect gifts for special occasions or everyday use with fun new custom foil cards & photo gifts
• Custom Photo Can Cooler
• Custom Embossed Foil Cards in gold, silver, or rose gold metallic foil & Seal & Send (all-in-one) cards
• Copper Star, Rustic Mitten & Snowflake Ornaments for the Christmas Tree
• Custom Face Masks
• Tshirts
• NEW SIZE! 7x5 Photo Book to highlight the year in review
• Black Photo Coffee Mug in 10oz. & 15oz., Insulated Coffee Mug & Wine Cup plus Enamel Campfire Mug to keep your favorite beverages hot or cold
• 8x8 Photo Tile
• Personalize Stone Coasters with photos
• Personalized Beach Towels for pool party fun
• Custom Tea Towels & Pot Holders make cooking fun
• Custom Playing Cards & Puzzle with Tin for games nights
• Leatherette Desk Set for home-working order
 
More Products: 
Order prints, create personalized cards, invites or announcements, plus make custom photo gifts like photo canvas, photo books, mugs, blankets, pillows, tote bags, tree ornaments, key chains & photo panels
• Prints & Framed Prints to refresh your space
• Cards in a variety of designs with back of card customization & return address printing are perfect for party invites, announcements & special occasions
• Canvases & Photo Books with a wide array of new layouts
• Blankets & Pillows to cozy into at home
• Tote Bags perfect for everyday use
 
Your Questions, Answered: 
• Change book layouts: Click on the individual page you’d like to change to see different layout options
• Cropping: Our crop options provide the best fit to the dimensions of your prints. Be sure to review the cropping of your prints before you order
• Free Prints: You may see your 4x6 prints listed as $0.09 before you place your order. Don't worry, you’re still getting your free prints! Once you’re in the cart to place your order, you will see your prints reflect the final discount.  If you are placing an international order, you will be charged the appropriate international shipping rate
• Grid vs. Album: Click “Show Albums” or “Show Grid” to view your photos by album or date so you don't have to scroll through all your photos in the camera roll

Snapfish LLC is part of the international Shutterfly Inc family of personalized cards + gifting websites + apps

comments: Quality of printed items can be iffy(streaks thru the print on the frosted glasses, photobooks being over glued or not well sealed, or the wrong cover on the wrong book of pics etc) but isnt horrible in my experience. Just affordable with great deals all the time. Shipoing is usually good and quick even when paying normal shipping fees, if its a coupon deal or code for free shipping included. I hate that none of the coupons for prints have applied to in store pickup. Isnt logically but ok LOL

I have tried to order photos multiple times this month, but on check out receive an error "there was a problem loading one or more images in your order. Please remove them by clicking the edit button" but when I click edit, it doesn't tell me what image is the problem, and it won't let me go any further. I have tried completely restarting my order multiple times. I'll be looking for a different photo printing app because I've already wasted so much time trying to get my order through.

I enjoy making great gifts on this App, I have ordered many different products over the years and every time I have been impressed by the quantity of the printing. The App makes everything easy and straightforward. Although if you want to see all the 'deals' snapfish have on offer, you are better off first looking online at their site and copying the CODEWORDS as there's always heaps more on there than on the app.

Several times I selected my free prints when I pressed order it had deselect them so had to start again. Also they are supposed to be free but it adds up the price of each photo before you check out. Just a simple select free photo button would make things much easier.I also use Freeprints.They have a much better app than you.

Been using for years and have NEVER been let down. Love this app, the unlimited storage, the deals on projects, I could go on and on. You won't be disappointed if you download...but you WILL get addicted to putting together projects!!

title: Collage Maker: Collage Photo, Photo Frame
description:
Collage Maker: Collage Photo, Photo Frame is an powerful android applications which contains photo editing features to create photo collage grid upto 9 photos. 
It means user can combine multiple photos of their memories in one frame and create the awesome collage frame
You won't believe how easy it is to to creat collages, edit photo and add photo frames. You can also change the 
photo grid, add photo stickers, add text on photo and use photo grid with Collage Maker - Collage Photo, Photo Frame!!

✨ Collage Maker - Collage Photo, Photo Frame key features: 
- 70 different styles of grid layouts.
- Lots of pre-designed backgrounds, stickers and frames are available to use for.
- Easy to change grids border colors, backgrounds, patterns and frames.
- Create the Photo Collage Frames with using collage maker tool.
- Support upto 9 photos in one frame and have 60+ different collage styles.
- Adjust the border spacing between grid images.
- Write some quotes and add some funny stickers on Photo Collage Frame.
- Save your creation and share it on social sites just by on click.
- Browse saved collage frames within the application.

📸 Collage Maker & Photo Collage: Collage Maker gives a good look to the photo collage frame app contains customization tool to set spacing between grids, set backgrounds, set background colors, add frame on photo collage.

📸 Grid: Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds.
 Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.
📸 Frame maker: The app contains more than 60+ predefined photo collage layouts and even allows users to create photos themselves.

All collages created in the application can be decorated with a variety of stickers, backgrounds and text.
You are free to choose from over 15 different fonts, change the text size, color, style and more ...
Best of all, photo grid apps are controlled by easy-to-remember touch gestures that make editing very enjoyable.
You can easily creat your own memory in one pictures and share with your friends.

title: QuickPic+ Gallery: Photo Manager & Editor
description:
Fast, lightweight, modern, QP Gallery is the best alternative album app for all your beloved photos, which can replace the stock Gallery app.
Arguably the best gallery app for Android.

QuickPic+ is an Android image display which is easy to use, light and very eye-pleasing. 

The application allows you to surf all your photos at the fastest possible speed, showing you miniature displays in the resolution that you select.

QuickPic+ is one of the best tools that you have available to see images on your mobile phone. It is simple, elegant, and it allows you to do whatever you want with your pictures: rotate, widen, set as desktop background...

ADVANCED PHOTO EDITOR

SUPPORT FOR MANY FILE TYPES

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE FILE MANAGER

RECOVER DELETED PHOTOS & VIDEOS

PROTECT & HIDE PHOTOS, VIDEOS & FILES

Features:
- Search
- Slideshow
- Notch support
- Pinning folders to the top
- Filtering media files by type
- Recycle bin for easy file recovery
- Fullscreen view orientation locking
- Marking favorite files for easy access
- Quick fullscreen media closing with down gesture
- An editor for modifying images and applying filters
- Password protection for protecting hidden items or the whole app
- Changing the thumbnail column count with gestures or menu buttons
- Customizable bottom actions at the fullscreen view for quick access
- Showing extended details over fullscreen media with desired file properties
- Several different ways of sorting or grouping items, both ascending and descending
- Hiding folders (affects other apps too), excluding folders (affects only QuickPic+)
- The fingerprint permission is needed for locking either hidden item visibility, the whole app, or protecting files from being deleted.
– Free & clean.
– List thousands of pictures in a flash, find new pictures instantly
– Moments: Group photos by time and location
– View and slide show your Photos with the best quality, clearer than other apps
– Include or exclude specified folders for more efficient scanning
– Easily hide your privacy photos and videos from all gallery apps, protect them with a password.
– Play GIFs and videos
– Smooth experience: sliding shift or switch, pinch, double tap (and drag) to zoom, 2 finders rotate
– Internal picture editor which allows you to rotate, shrink, crop pictures, set wallpaper with best quality freely
– Powerful file management features, including sort, rename, create new folders, moving and copying pictures
– Optimized for large screens, such as tablets
– Material design! (Immersive mode, translucent bars)

Tips:
– No apps from Play Store can modify the external SD card in KitKat (Android 4.4), this is Google’s limitation.
– Please BACKUP YOUR IMPORTANT PHOTOS before your do file operations
– Long press a thumbnail to enter multi-select mode.
– Reinstall the app to clear your password.

title: Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser
description:
Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser is an application that is designed to change the background of your photo. You can erase background of your photo. Auto background changer also works as a background eraser. You can upload different backgrounds, stickers, and text of various colors for your photo using the photo background changer. Many of the apps demand you to pay before downloading the app but this app is totally free of cost. Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser is designed using the latest AI technology. Photo Background Changer is a good app for the eye-catching and beautiful appearance of a photo very efficiently and quickly. All the editing will be in few seconds. The background of a photo is very important so the Photo background changer is the best and free app to change or erase background of your photo🖼. 

 key features of Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser 

✯ Time saver
✯ User friendly
✯ Photo Background changer
✯ One-click Background eraser
✯ Remove unwanted objects from your photo
✯ Change appearance of the picture by a finger touch
✯ Can change the appearance on the screen by finger touch
✯ Photo Background changer is Compatible with all android versions
✯ Photo Background changer does not take too much space in your mobile

 How to use Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser 

Changing the background of a picture has become a simple one-click process using the photo background changer🖌. The interface of the Auto background changer will provide you various options on the screen including camera, auto background changer, gallery, and my pictures. You can select an image from your mobile phone gallery or camera 📸 . Feature to crop the image is also available✂.  You can crop as much as you want. Zoom in/out features is also provided in the Auto background changer for your convenience. Background eraser has no technical features to use. “Green tick mark is used to save the photo”. When you have crop the photo and want to save this, it will ask you to change the background. From the background option, you can change or erase background of your photo. Blur background feature could be used to blur the background of your photo. The background could be selected from your phone gallery. My pictures option on the screen will save your edited pictures. In Auto background changer features like stickers and text are also provided for the beauty of your photo. Now you are able to save the photo at any place in your gallery.

 Benefits of using Photo Background Changer 2021 - Background Eraser 

Now there will be no need for any payment to erase background of your image. You are not required to learn the practical work of Photoshop to change background. After editing, your image will have a professional look. It will work like a background eraser. The edges will be clear and sharp. Your photo will be in high-quality backgrounds without any mistake. Every time when you want to change background, it will smoothly upload the picture from the gallery. The picture will be in PNG format and now you can save and share your picture anywhere on your social accounts. New backgrounds could also be added using auto background changer 2021🖼.

Aesthetic Photo Editor allows you add cool aesthetic glitch effects to your photos. Start your psychedelic journey with glitch effects. If you are a fan of Aesthetic style, you can not skip this Aesthetic photo editor.

A must-have blur photo editor with advanced blur image brush. It is used to blur parts of your photo to get DSLR blur effect. You can also unblur the image with eraser and adjust its blur strength as well.

Use this advanced background eraser, seamlessly combine your cutout photo with a ton of creative background templates. Both an AI cutout tool and a background changer designed for you to make artworks easily and quickly.

Photo Editor New Version 2021
A useful photo editor free with massive filters for pictures. Powerfully make you a vivid photo artwork with Glitch effects, double exposure, photo blender etc. It is the best photo editor free.

Photo Collage Maker
Just select several pictures, Photo Editor instantly remix them into cool photo collage. Pick layout you like best, edit collage with filters, background, stickers, etc.

Photo Editor Pro asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

title: SlideScan - Slide Scanner App
description:
Brought to you by the developer that built the smartest photo scanner app, Photomyne is proud to now also offer an AI-powered photo slides scanning app that will blow you away. See how those hidden memories in slides are instantly revealed, scanned and saved!


IT’S AUTOMATIC - JUST ADD SLIDES:
1. Open a backlight source on your computer (or use the link provided in the app)
2. Hold the slide in front of the light
3. Long-press the capture button
4. See slides magically scanned and images revealed

The app’s smart algorithm will automatically crop, rotate, enhance, and save the slide as a digital photo in the app.

CELEBRATE YOUR NEWLY SCANNED SLIDES:
* Save the new digital photos to your phone
* Share your photos and collages with the people you love

OPTIONAL IN-APP UPGRADE:
The first few photos are free. For unlimited use, consider purchasing an optional paid plan (in-app purchase). 
Here are the premium features you get with a paid plan:
* Unlimited scanning
* Unlimited photo saving and sharing

The app offers an optional paid plan via monthly/yearly auto-renewing subscriptions**, as well as a One-Time plan which is paid for by a single upfront payment (valid for 2 years). These offer unlimited access to the premium mentioned above.

Got any questions? We’d love to connect: support@photomyne.com
Privacy Policy: https://photomyne.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://photomyne.com/terms-of-use

recentChanges: This release includes a major change to premium features. A subscription now includes cloud storage and account access on multiple devices. In addition, subscribers can also access their photos from a PC.
comments: The images are not well focused. It could be my inability to both hold the picture perpendicular to the lighted screen and hold my phone still with the camera in focus. I tested it on the same slide I photographed with my own method which came out perfectly focused. My method: have your lighted screen laying horizontally (laptop with screen part on table). Make a simple slide platform that holds the slide about 1" from the screen and another platform to hold the phone 5" above the slide.

So, basically what you get for free is a demo version of this app. It functions, but you can't do anything with your photos unless you purchase the app. Price is reasonable, but I wish they'd be just up front about it. Why the deception?

Easy to use and higher quality scans of my slides than any of the machines I've purchased in the past to scan slides with. I'm going through my parents slides and have over 1,000 finished. Lots more to go 😂. I can scan quickly too!
The scanner works well. However, you can only scan 12 slides before you are forced to purchase a premium package.

The most infuriating thing about the app is that even after paying for it every image you share it adds a promotional link to the image . I also can't get these apps in Google photos to edit them stuck with their limited options. Atleast don't cheat people

title: Night Mode Camera (Photo and Video)
description: Fast and Simple app for taking bright images and videos. While your photo flesh is unable to light the exotic beauty of nature, or moon and stars high in the skies, or beautiful sea waves, or flowers at night:  Night Mode Camera is ready to do that at the lowest luminosity without any additional appliances. With low light support during the photo/video recording, you can dynamically change camera sensitivity to achieve the best result as well as set any 1-8x zoom simultaneous to the recording due to the professional development.  The app not only allows you to keep and organize your own library but as well to share them on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and basically everywhere, where you would prefer.

title: Photo Frames - Nature Backgrounds, Waterfall frame
description:
Beautiful Nature, World Famous Waterfall Photos turned into Photo Frames to decorate your photos with the ability to Add Text and Draw on Photos in Styles.


How to Frame with a background:
1. Chose the photo you want to change the background.
2. Using AI we will remove the background of the photo.
3. Chose one of 1000's of photo backgrounds including Architecture, Animal backgrounds, and waterfall photos.
4. Adjust the photo on the background.
5. You can add text on the result photo or draw on the picture.
6. Save and background changed photo or share with friends and family.

How to Frame your photos with Waterfalls Frames or other nature Photos:
1. Select one of the 1000's world-famous Waterfalls photos or nature backgrounds.
2. Chose the Photo you want to include the  Frame. You can choose the shape of the Photo to be Heart, Circle, Square, Star Photo.
3. Add Text on Photo or Draw on Picture free hand.
4. Save the Frames to your Photo Gallery.

You can set Live wallpapers easily:
1. Chose Waterfall backgrounds or nature backgrounds or animal backgrounds you want to use live wallpapers.
2. Set the category as live wallpapers. 

Photo Frames now include the ability to Create Cover Pages for Social Networks. Create Cover Pages with your photos in Free Form Collages over Waterfall Photo Background.

Most of the settings (if not all) already exist in the stock camera pro mode. 8 megapixels is way to low when the stock camera offers full resolution (42, 64, or even 108 megapixels in 2021), so basically this app is useless. Try the gcam mod if you want different image processing.
